lemma rsa_inv_set_spmf_I:
  assumes "((N, e), d) âˆˆ set_spmf I"
  shows "((((x::nat) ^ e) mod N) ^ d) mod N = x mod N"
proof-
  obtain P Q where "N = P * Q" and "d = nat (fst (bezw e ((P-1)*(Q-1))) mod int ((P-1)*(Q-1)))"  
    and "prime P" 
    and "prime Q" 
    and "coprime e ((P - 1)*(Q - 1))" 
    and "P â‰  Q"
    using assms set_spmf_I_N 
    by blast
  moreover have "e > 1" and "d > 1" using set_spmf_I_e_d assms by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis using rsa_inv by blast
qed
  
sublocale etp_rsa: etp I domain range F Fâ‡©iâ‡©nâ‡©v 
  unfolding etp_def apply(auto simp add: etp_def dom_eq_ran finite_range bij_betw1 lossless_I)
   apply (metis fst_conv lessThan_iff mem_simps(2) nat_0_less_mult_iff prime_gt_0_nat range_def set_spmf_I_N)
  apply(auto simp add: F_def Fâ‡©iâ‡©nâ‡©v_def) using rsa_inv_set_spmf_I 
  by (simp add: range_def)

sublocale etp: ETP_base I domain range B F Fâ‡©iâ‡©nâ‡©v
  unfolding ETP_base_def 
  by (simp add: etp_rsa.etp_axioms)


textâ€¹After proving the RSA collection is an ETP the proofs of security come easily from the general proofs.â€º

lemma correctness_rsa: "etp.OT_12.correctness m1 m2"
  by (rule local.etp.correct)

lemma P1_security_rsa: "etp.OT_12.perfect_sec_P1 m1 m2" 
  by(rule local.etp.P1_security_inf_the)

lemma P2_security_rsa:
  assumes "âˆ€ a. lossless_spmf (D a)"
    and "â‹€bâ‡©Ïƒ. local.etp_rsa.HCP_adv etp.ğ’œ m2 bâ‡©Ïƒ D â‰¤ HCP_ad"
  shows "etp.OT_12.adv_P2 m1 m2 D â‰¤ 2 * HCP_ad"
  by(simp add: local.etp.P2_security assms)

end 

locale rsa_asym =
  fixes prime_set :: "nat â‡’ nat set"
    and B :: "index â‡’ nat â‡’ bool"
  assumes rsa_proof_assm: "â‹€ n. rsa_base (prime_set n)"
begin

sublocale rsa_base "(prime_set n)" B  
  using local.rsa_proof_assm  by simp

lemma correctness_rsa_asymp: 
  shows "etp.OT_12.correctness n m1 m2"
  by(rule correctness_rsa)

lemma P1_sec_asymp: "etp.OT_12.perfect_sec_P1 n m1 m2" 
  by(rule local.P1_security_rsa)

lemma P2_sec_asym: 
  assumes "âˆ€ a. lossless_spmf (D a)" 
    and HCP_adv_neg: "negligible (Î» n. hcp_advantage n)"
    and hcp_adv_bound:  "âˆ€bâ‡©Ïƒ n. local.etp_rsa.HCP_adv n etp.ğ’œ m2 bâ‡©Ïƒ D â‰¤ hcp_advantage n"
  shows "negligible (Î» n. etp.OT_12.adv_P2 n m1 m2 D)"
proof-
  have "negligible (Î» n. 2 * hcp_advantage n)" using HCP_adv_neg 
    by (simp add: negligible_cmultI)
  moreover have "Â¦etp.OT_12.adv_P2 n m1 m2 DÂ¦ = etp.OT_12.adv_P2 n m1 m2 D" 
    for n unfolding sim_det_def.adv_P2_def local.etp.OT_12.adv_P2_def by linarith
  moreover have "etp.OT_12.adv_P2 n m1 m2 D â‰¤ 2 * hcp_advantage n" for n
    using P2_security_rsa assms by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using assms negligible_le by presburger 
qed

end

end

Theory Noar_Pinkas_OT

subsection â€¹Noar Pinkas OTâ€º

textâ€¹Here we prove security for the Noar Pinkas OT from \cite{DBLP:conf/soda/NaorP01}.â€º

theory Noar_Pinkas_OT imports
  Cyclic_Group_Ext 
  Game_Based_Crypto.Diffie_Hellman
  OT_Functionalities 
  Semi_Honest_Def
  Uniform_Sampling 
begin

locale np_base = 
  fixes ğ’¢ :: "'grp cyclic_group" (structure)
  assumes finite_group: "finite (carrier ğ’¢)"
    and or_gt_0: "0 < order ğ’¢"
    and prime_order: "prime (order ğ’¢)"
begin

lemma prime_field: "a < (order ğ’¢) âŸ¹ a â‰  0 âŸ¹ coprime a (order ğ’¢)"
  by(metis dvd_imp_le neq0_conv not_le prime_imp_coprime prime_order coprime_commute)

lemma weight_sample_uniform_units: "weight_spmf (sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢)) = 1"
  using  lossless_spmf_def lossless_sample_uniform_units prime_order  prime_gt_1_nat by auto

definition protocol :: "('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ bool â‡’ (unit Ã— 'grp) spmf"
  where "protocol M v = do {
    let (m0,m1) = M;
    a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
    câ‡©v' :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
    s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
    let z0' = ((â™g [^] (if v then câ‡©v' else câ‡©v)) [^] s0) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r0);
    r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
    s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
    let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
    let z1' = ((â™g [^] ((if v then câ‡©v else câ‡©v'))) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
    let enc_m0 = z0' âŠ— m0;
    let enc_m1 = z1' âŠ— m1;
    let out_2 = (if v then enc_m1 âŠ— inv (w1 [^] b) else enc_m0 âŠ— inv (w0 [^] b));
    return_spmf ((), out_2)}"

lemma lossless_protocol: "lossless_spmf (protocol M Ïƒ)"
  apply(auto simp add: protocol_def Let_def split_def lossless_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)
  using prime_order prime_gt_1_nat lossless_sample_uniform_units by simp

type_synonym 'grp' view1 = "(('grp' Ã— 'grp') Ã— ('grp' Ã— 'grp' Ã— 'grp' Ã— 'grp')) spmf"

type_synonym 'grp' dist_adversary = "(('grp' Ã— 'grp') Ã— 'grp' Ã— 'grp' Ã— 'grp' Ã— 'grp') â‡’ bool spmf"

definition R1 :: "('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ bool â‡’ 'grp view1"
  where "R1 msgs Ïƒ = do {
    let (m0, m1) = msgs;
    a â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    b â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let câ‡©Ïƒ = a*b;
    câ‡©Ïƒ' â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    return_spmf (msgs, (â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, (if Ïƒ then â™g [^] câ‡©Ïƒ' else â™g [^] câ‡©Ïƒ), (if Ïƒ then â™g [^] câ‡©Ïƒ else â™g [^] câ‡©Ïƒ')))}"  

lemma lossless_R1: "lossless_spmf (R1 M Ïƒ)"
  by(simp add: R1_def Let_def lossless_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)

definition inter :: "('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ 'grp view1"
  where "inter msgs = do {
    a â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    b â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);  
    c â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    d â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    return_spmf (msgs, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] c, â™g [^] d)}"

definition S1 :: "('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ unit â‡’ 'grp view1"
  where "S1 msgs out1 = do {
    let (m0, m1) = msgs;
    a â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    b â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    c â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    return_spmf (msgs, (â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] c, â™g [^] (a*b)))}"  

lemma lossless_S1: "lossless_spmf (S1 M out1)"
  by(simp add: S1_def Let_def lossless_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)

fun R1_inter_adversary :: "'grp dist_adversary â‡’ ('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ 'grp â‡’ 'grp â‡’ 'grp â‡’ bool spmf"
  where "R1_inter_adversary ğ’œ msgs Î± Î² Î³ = do {
    c â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    ğ’œ (msgs, Î±, Î², Î³, â™g [^] c)}"

fun inter_S1_adversary :: "'grp dist_adversary â‡’ ('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ 'grp â‡’ 'grp â‡’ 'grp â‡’ bool spmf"
  where "inter_S1_adversary ğ’œ msgs Î± Î² Î³ = do {
    c â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    ğ’œ (msgs, Î±, Î², â™g [^] c, Î³)}"

sublocale ddh: ddh ğ’¢ .

definition R2 :: "('grp Ã— 'grp) â‡’ bool â‡’ (bool Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã—  'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp) spmf" 
  where "R2 M v  = do {
  let (m0,m1) = M;
  a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
  b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
  let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
  câ‡©v' :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
  r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
  let z = ((â™g [^] câ‡©v') [^] s0) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r0);
  r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
  let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
  let enc_m = z âŠ— (if v then m0 else m1);
  let enc_m' = z' âŠ— (if v then m1 else m0) ;
  return_spmf(v, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}" 

lemma lossless_R2: "lossless_spmf (R2 M Ïƒ)"
  apply(simp add: R2_def Let_def split_def lossless_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)
  using prime_order prime_gt_1_nat lossless_sample_uniform_units by simp

definition S2 :: "bool â‡’ 'grp â‡’ (bool Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp Ã— 'grp) spmf" 
  where "S2 v m =  do {
  a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
  b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
  let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
  r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
  r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
  let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
  let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
  s' â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
  let enc_m =  â™g [^] s';
  let enc_m' = z' âŠ— m ;
  return_spmf(v, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}"

lemma lossless_S2: "lossless_spmf (S2 Ïƒ out2)"
  apply(simp add: S2_def Let_def lossless_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)
  using prime_order prime_gt_1_nat lossless_sample_uniform_units by simp

sublocale sim_def: sim_det_def R1 S1 R2 S2 funct_OT_12 protocol
  unfolding sim_det_def_def 
  by(auto simp add: lossless_R1 lossless_S1 lossless_R2 lossless_S2 lossless_protocol lossless_funct_OT_12)

end

locale np = np_base + cyclic_group ğ’¢
begin

lemma protocol_inverse: 
  assumes "m0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" "m1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
  shows" ((â™g [^] ((a*b) mod (order ğ’¢))) [^] (s1 :: nat)) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] (r1::nat)) âŠ— (if v then m0 else m1) âŠ— inv (((â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1) [^] b) 
        = (if v then m0 else m1)"
(is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have  1: "(a*b)*(s1) + b*r1 =((a::nat)*(s1) + r1)*b " using mult.commute mult.assoc  add_mult_distrib by auto
  have "?lhs = 
 ((â™g [^] (a*b)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1) âŠ— (if v then m0 else m1) âŠ— inv (((â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1) [^] b)"
    by(simp add: pow_generator_mod)
  also have "... = (â™g [^] ((a*b)*(s1))) âŠ— ((â™g [^] (b*r1))) âŠ— ((if v then m0 else m1) âŠ— inv (((â™g [^] ((a*(s1) + r1)*b)))))"
    by(auto simp add: nat_pow_pow nat_pow_mult assms cyclic_group_assoc)
  also have "... = â™g [^] ((a*b)*(s1)) âŠ— â™g [^] (b*r1) âŠ— ((inv (((â™g [^] ((a*(s1) + r1)*b))))) âŠ— (if v then m0 else m1))"
    by(simp add: nat_pow_mult cyclic_group_commute assms)
  also have "... = (â™g [^] ((a*b)*(s1) + b*r1) âŠ— inv (((â™g [^] ((a*(s1) + r1)*b))))) âŠ— (if v then m0 else m1)"
    by(simp add: nat_pow_mult cyclic_group_assoc assms)
  also have "... = (â™g [^] ((a*b)*(s1) + b*r1) âŠ— inv (((â™g [^] (((a*b)*(s1) + r1*b)))))) âŠ— (if v then m0 else m1)"
    using 1 by (simp add: mult.commute)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using l_cancel_inv assms  by (simp add: mult.commute)
qed

lemma correctness: 
  assumes "m0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" "m1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
  shows "sim_def.correctness (m0,m1) Ïƒ"
proof-
  have "protocol (m0, m1) Ïƒ = funct_OT_12 (m0, m1) Ïƒ"
  proof-
    have "protocol (m0, m1) Ïƒ = do {
    a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
    s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
    let out_2 = ((â™g [^] ((a*b) mod (order ğ’¢))) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1) âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0) âŠ— inv (((â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1) [^] b);
    return_spmf ((), out_2)}"
      by(simp add: protocol_def lossless_sample_uniform_units bind_spmf_const weight_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)
    also have "... = do {   
    let out_2 = (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0);
    return_spmf ((), out_2)}"
      by(simp add: protocol_inverse assms lossless_sample_uniform_units bind_spmf_const weight_sample_uniform_units or_gt_0)
    ultimately show ?thesis by(simp add: Let_def funct_OT_12_def)
  qed
  thus ?thesis 
    by(simp add: sim_def.correctness_def)
qed

lemma security_P1: 
  shows "sim_def.adv_P1 msgs Ïƒ D â‰¤ ddh.advantage (R1_inter_adversary D msgs) + ddh.advantage (inter_S1_adversary D msgs)"
    (is "?lhs â‰¤ ?rhs")
proof(cases Ïƒ)
  case True
  have "R1 msgs Ïƒ = S1 msgs out1" for out1
    by(simp add: R1_def S1_def True)
  then have "sim_def.adv_P1 msgs Ïƒ D = 0"
    by(simp add: sim_def.adv_P1_def funct_OT_12_def) 
  also have "ddh.advantage A â‰¥ 0" for A using ddh.advantage_def by simp 
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp 
next
  case False
  have bounded_advantage: "Â¦(a :: real) - bÂ¦ = e1 âŸ¹ Â¦b - cÂ¦ = e2 âŸ¹ Â¦a - cÂ¦ â‰¤ e1 + e2" 
    for a b e1 c e2 by simp
  also have R1_inter_dist: "Â¦spmf (R1 msgs False â¤œ D) True - spmf ((inter msgs) â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦ = ddh.advantage (R1_inter_adversary D msgs)"
    unfolding R1_def inter_def ddh.advantage_def ddh.ddh_0_def ddh.ddh_1_def Let_def split_def by(simp)
  also  have inter_S1_dist: "Â¦spmf ((inter msgs) â¤œ D) True - spmf (S1 msgs out1 â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦ = ddh.advantage (inter_S1_adversary D msgs)" 
    for out1 including monad_normalisation
    by(simp add: S1_def inter_def ddh.advantage_def ddh.ddh_0_def ddh.ddh_1_def) 
  ultimately have "Â¦spmf (R1 msgs False â¤œ (Î»view. D view)) True - spmf (S1 msgs out1 â¤œ (Î»view. D view)) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ ?rhs"
    for out1 using R1_inter_dist by auto
  thus ?thesis by(simp add: sim_def.adv_P1_def funct_OT_12_def False) 
qed

lemma add_mult_one_time_pad: 
  assumes "s0 < order ğ’¢" 
    and "s0 â‰  0"
  shows "map_spmf (Î» câ‡©v'. (((b* r0) + (s0 * câ‡©v')) mod(order ğ’¢))) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢)) = sample_uniform (order ğ’¢)"
proof-
  have "gcd s0 (order ğ’¢) = 1" 
    using assms prime_field by simp
  thus ?thesis 
    using add_mult_one_time_pad by force
qed

lemma security_P2: 
  assumes "m0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" "m1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
  shows "sim_def.perfect_sec_P2 (m0,m1) Ïƒ"
proof-
  have "R2 (m0, m1) Ïƒ = S2 Ïƒ (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0)"
    including monad_normalisation
  proof-
    have "R2 (m0, m1) Ïƒ = do {
      a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
      câ‡©v' :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
      let s' = (((b* r0) + ((câ‡©v')*(s0))) mod(order ğ’¢));
      let z = â™g [^] s' ;
      r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
      let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
      let enc_m = z âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m0 else m1); 
      let enc_m' = z' âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0) ;
      return_spmf(Ïƒ, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}" 
      by(simp add: R2_def nat_pow_pow nat_pow_mult pow_generator_mod add.commute) 
    also have "... =  do {
      a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
      r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
      s' â† map_spmf (Î» câ‡©v'. (((b* r0) + ((câ‡©v')*(s0))) mod(order ğ’¢))) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
      let z = â™g [^] s';
      r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
      let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
      let enc_m = z âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m0 else m1); 
      let enc_m' = z' âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0) ;
      return_spmf(Ïƒ, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}" 
      by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
    also have "... =  do {
      a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
      r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
      s' â†  (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
      let z = â™g [^] s';
      r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
      let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
      let enc_m = z âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m0 else m1); 
      let enc_m' = z' âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0) ;
      return_spmf(Ïƒ, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}"  
      by(simp add: add_mult_one_time_pad Let_def mult.commute cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
    also have "... =  do {
      a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
      r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
      r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
      let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
      enc_m â† map_spmf (Î» s'.  â™g [^] s' âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m0 else m1)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢)); 
      let enc_m' = z' âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0) ;
      return_spmf(Ïƒ, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}"
      by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
    also have "... =  do {
      a :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      b :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      let câ‡©v = (a*b) mod (order ğ’¢);
      r0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s0 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w0 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s0 âŠ— â™g [^] r0;
      r1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      s1 :: nat â† sample_uniform_units (order ğ’¢);
      let w1 = (â™g [^] a) [^] s1 âŠ— â™g [^] r1;
      let z' = ((â™g [^] (câ‡©v)) [^] s1) âŠ— ((â™g [^] b) [^] r1);
      enc_m â† map_spmf (Î» s'.  â™g [^] s') (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢)); 
      let enc_m' = z' âŠ— (if Ïƒ then m1 else m0) ;
      return_spmf(Ïƒ, â™g [^] a, â™g [^] b, â™g [^] câ‡©v, w0, enc_m, w1, enc_m')}"
      by(simp add: sample_uniform_one_time_pad assms)
    ultimately show ?thesis by(simp add: S2_def Let_def bind_map_spmf o_def)
  qed
  thus ?thesis 
    by(simp add: sim_def.perfect_sec_P2_def funct_OT_12_def)
qed

end 

locale np_asymp = 
  fixes ğ’¢ :: "security â‡’ 'grp cyclic_group"
  assumes np: "â‹€Î·. np (ğ’¢ Î·)"
begin
  
sublocale np "ğ’¢ Î·" for Î· by(simp add: np)

theorem correctness_asymp: 
  assumes "m0 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ Î·)" "m1 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ Î·)"
  shows "sim_def.correctness Î· (m0, m1) Ïƒ"
  by(simp add: correctness assms) 

theorem security_P1_asymp: 
  assumes "negligible (Î» Î·. ddh.advantage Î· (inter_S1_adversary Î· D msgs))"
    and "negligible (Î» Î·. ddh.advantage Î· (R1_inter_adversary Î·  D msgs))"
  shows "negligible (Î» Î·. sim_def.adv_P1 Î· msgs Ïƒ D)"
proof-
  have "sim_def.adv_P1 Î· msgs Ïƒ D â‰¤ ddh.advantage Î· (R1_inter_adversary Î·  D msgs) + ddh.advantage Î· (inter_S1_adversary Î· D msgs)" 
    for Î·
    using security_P1 by simp
  moreover have "negligible (Î» Î·. ddh.advantage Î· (R1_inter_adversary Î·  D msgs) + ddh.advantage Î· (inter_S1_adversary Î· D msgs))"
    using assms 
    by (simp add: negligible_plus)
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using negligible_le sim_def.adv_P1_def by auto
qed

theorem security_P2_asymp: 
  assumes "m0 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ Î·)" "m1 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ Î·)"
  shows "sim_def.perfect_sec_P2 Î· (m0,m1) Ïƒ"
  by(simp add: security_P2 assms)

end

end

Theory OT14

subsection â€¹1-out-of-2 OT to 1-out-of-4 OTâ€º

text â€¹Here we construct a protocol that achieves 1-out-of-4 OT from 1-out-of-2 OT. We follow the protocol
for constructing 1-out-of-n OT from 1-out-of-2 OT from \cite{DBLP:books/cu/Goldreich2004}. We assume the security
properties on 1-out-of-2 OT.â€º

theory OT14 imports
  Semi_Honest_Def
  OT_Functionalities
  Uniform_Sampling
begin

type_synonym input1 = "bool Ã— bool Ã— bool Ã— bool"
type_synonym input2 = "bool Ã— bool"
type_synonym 'v_OT121' view1 = "(input1 Ã— (bool Ã— bool Ã— bool Ã— bool Ã— bool Ã— bool) Ã— 'v_OT121' Ã— 'v_OT121' Ã— 'v_OT121')"
type_synonym 'v_OT122' view2 = "(input2 Ã— (bool Ã— bool Ã— bool Ã— bool) Ã— 'v_OT122' Ã— 'v_OT122' Ã— 'v_OT122')"

locale ot14_base = 
  fixes S1_OT12 :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ unit â‡’ 'v_OT121 spmf" â€• â€¹simulator for party 1 in OT12â€º
    and R1_OT12 :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT121 spmf" â€• â€¹real view for party 1 in OT12â€º
    and adv_OT12 :: real
    and S2_OT12 :: "bool â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT122 spmf" 
    and R2_OT12 :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT122 spmf"
    and protocol_OT12 :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ (unit Ã— bool) spmf"
  assumes ass_adv_OT12: "sim_det_def.adv_P1 R1_OT12 S1_OT12 funct_OT12 (m0,m1) c D â‰¤ adv_OT12" â€• â€¹bound the advantage of OT12 for party 1â€º 
    and inf_th_OT12_P2:  "sim_det_def.perfect_sec_P2 R2_OT12 S2_OT12 funct_OT12 (m0,m1) Ïƒ" â€• â€¹information theoretic security for party 2â€º
    and correct: "protocol_OT12 msgs b = funct_OT_12 msgs b"
    and lossless_R1_12: "lossless_spmf (R1_OT12 m c)"
    and lossless_S1_12: "lossless_spmf (S1_OT12 m out1)"
    and lossless_S2_12: "lossless_spmf (S2_OT12 c out2)"
    and lossless_R2_12: "lossless_spmf (R2_OT12 M c)"
    and lossless_funct_OT12: "lossless_spmf (funct_OT12 (m0,m1) c)"
    and lossless_protocol_OT12: "lossless_spmf (protocol_OT12 M C)"
begin

sublocale OT_12_sim: sim_det_def R1_OT12 S1_OT12 R2_OT12 S2_OT12 funct_OT_12 protocol_OT12
  unfolding sim_det_def_def 
  by(simp add: lossless_R1_12 lossless_S1_12 lossless_funct_OT12 lossless_R2_12 lossless_S2_12)

lemma OT_12_P1_assms_bound': "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c) (Î» view. ((D::'v_OT121 â‡’ bool spmf) view ))) True 
                - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (D view ))) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_OT12"
proof-
  have "sim_det_def.adv_P1 R1_OT12 S1_OT12 funct_OT_12 (m0,m1) c D =
                      Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c) (Î» view. (D view ))) True 
                                    - spmf (funct_OT_12 (m0,m1) c â¤œ (Î» ((out1::unit), (out2::bool)). 
                                              S1_OT12 (m0,m1) out1 â¤œ (Î» view. D view))) TrueÂ¦"
    using sim_det_def.adv_P1_def 
    using  OT_12_sim.adv_P1_def by auto
  also have "... = Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c) (Î» view. ((D::'v_OT121 â‡’ bool spmf) view ))) True 
                - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (D view ))) TrueÂ¦" 
    by(simp add: funct_OT_12_def)
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by(metis ass_adv_OT12)
qed

lemma OT_12_P2_assm: "R2_OT12 (m0,m1) Ïƒ = funct_OT_12 (m0,m1) Ïƒ â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S2_OT12 Ïƒ out2)"
  using inf_th_OT12_P2 OT_12_sim.perfect_sec_P2_def by blast

definition protocol_14_OT :: "input1 â‡’ input2 â‡’ (unit Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "protocol_14_OT M C = do {
    let (c0,c1) = C;
    let (m00, m01, m10, m11) = M;
    S0 â† coin_spmf;
    S1 â† coin_spmf;
    S2 â† coin_spmf;
    S3 â† coin_spmf;
    S4 â† coin_spmf;
    S5 â† coin_spmf;
    let a0 = S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• m00;
    let a1 = S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m01;
    let a2 = S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m10;
    let a3 = S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• m11;
    (_,Si) â† protocol_OT12 (S0, S1) c0;
    (_,Sj) â† protocol_OT12 (S2, S3) c1;
    (_,Sk) â† protocol_OT12 (S4, S5) c1;
    let s2 = Si âŠ• (if c0 then Sk else Sj) âŠ• (if c0 then (if c1 then a3 else a2) else (if c1 then a1 else a0));
    return_spmf ((), s2)}"

lemma lossless_protocol_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (protocol_14_OT M C)" 
  by(simp add: protocol_14_OT_def lossless_protocol_OT12 split_def)

definition R1_14 :: "input1 â‡’ input2 â‡’ 'v_OT121 view1 spmf"
  where "R1_14 msgs choice = do {
    let (m00, m01, m10, m11) = msgs;
    let (c0, c1) = choice;
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S0, S1) c0; 
    b :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S2, S3) c1;
    c :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S4, S5) c1;
    return_spmf (msgs, (S0, S1, S2, S3, S4, S5), a, b, c)}"

lemma lossless_R1_14: "lossless_spmf (R1_14 msgs C)"
  by(simp add: R1_14_def split_def lossless_R1_12)

definition R1_14_interm1 :: "input1 â‡’ input2 â‡’ 'v_OT121 view1 spmf"
  where "R1_14_interm1 msgs choice = do {
    let (m00, m01, m10, m11) = msgs;
    let (c0, c1) = choice;
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S0, S1) (); 
    b :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S2, S3) c1;
    c :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S4, S5) c1;
    return_spmf (msgs, (S0, S1, S2, S3, S4, S5), a, b, c)}"

lemma lossless_R1_14_interm1: "lossless_spmf (R1_14_interm1 msgs C)"
  by(simp add: R1_14_interm1_def split_def lossless_R1_12 lossless_S1_12)

definition R1_14_interm2 :: "input1 â‡’ input2 â‡’ 'v_OT121 view1 spmf"
  where "R1_14_interm2 msgs choice = do {
    let (m00, m01, m10, m11) = msgs;
    let (c0, c1) = choice;
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S0, S1) (); 
    b :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S2, S3) ();
    c :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S4, S5) c1;
    return_spmf (msgs, (S0, S1, S2, S3, S4, S5), a, b, c)}"

lemma lossless_R1_14_interm2: "lossless_spmf (R1_14_interm2 msgs C)"
  by(simp add: R1_14_interm2_def split_def lossless_R1_12 lossless_S1_12)

definition S1_14 :: "input1 â‡’ unit â‡’ 'v_OT121 view1 spmf"
  where "S1_14 msgs _ = do {   
    let (m00, m01, m10, m11) = msgs;    
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S0, S1) (); 
    b :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S2, S3) ();
    c :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S4, S5) ();
    return_spmf (msgs, (S0, S1, S2, S3, S4, S5), a, b, c)}"

lemma lossless_S1_14: "lossless_spmf (S1_14 m out)"
  by(simp add: S1_14_def lossless_S1_12)

lemma reduction_step1: 
  shows "âˆƒ A1. Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ =
              Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c0) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                  spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  define A1' where "A1' == Î» (view :: 'v_OT121) (m0,m1). do {
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    b :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S2, S3) c1;
    c :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S4, S5) c1;
    let R = (M, (m0,m1, S2, S3, S4, S5), view, b, c);
    D R}"
  have "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ =
       Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c0) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1))))) True -
        spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
    apply(simp add: pair_spmf_alt_def R1_14_def R1_14_interm1_def A1'_def Let_def split_def) 
    apply(subst bind_commute_spmf[of "S1_OT12 _ _"])
    apply(subst bind_commute_spmf[of "S1_OT12 _ _"])
    apply(subst bind_commute_spmf[of "S1_OT12 _ _"])
    apply(subst bind_commute_spmf[of "S1_OT12 _ _"])
    apply(subst bind_commute_spmf[of "S1_OT12 _ _"])
    by auto
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma reduction_step1':
  shows "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c0) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                  spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦ 
                        â‰¤ adv_OT12"
  (is "?lhs â‰¤ adv_OT12")
proof-
  have int1: "integrable (measure_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf)) (Î»x. spmf (case x of (m0, m1) â‡’ R1_OT12 (m0, m1) c0 â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view (m0, m1))) True)" 
    and int2: "integrable (measure_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf)) (Î»x. spmf (case x of (m0, m1) â‡’ S1_OT12 (m0, m1) () â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view (m0, m1))) True)" 
    by(rule measure_spmf.integrable_const_bound[where B=1]; simp add: pmf_le_1)+
  have "?lhs = 
            Â¦LINT x|measure_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf). spmf (case x of (m0, m1) â‡’ R1_OT12 (m0, m1) c0 â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view (m0, m1))) True 
              - spmf (case x of (m0, m1) â‡’ S1_OT12 (m0, m1) () â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view (m0, m1))) TrueÂ¦"
    apply(subst (1 2) spmf_bind) using int1 int2 by simp
  also have "... â‰¤ LINT x|measure_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf). 
               Â¦spmf (R1_OT12 x c0 â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view x)) True - spmf (S1_OT12 x () â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view x)) TrueÂ¦"
    by(rule integral_abs_bound[THEN order_trans]; simp add: split_beta)
  ultimately have "?lhs â‰¤ LINT x|measure_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf). 
                      Â¦spmf (R1_OT12 x c0 â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view x)) True - spmf (S1_OT12 x () â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view x)) TrueÂ¦"
    by simp
  also have "LINT x|measure_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf). 
                Â¦spmf (R1_OT12 x c0 â¤œ (Î»view::'v_OT121. A1 view x)) True 
                    - spmf (S1_OT12 x () â¤œ (Î»view::'v_OT121. A1 view x)) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_OT12"
    apply(rule integral_mono[THEN order_trans])
       apply(rule measure_spmf.integrable_const_bound[where B=2])
        apply clarsimp
        apply(rule abs_triangle_ineq4[THEN order_trans])
    subgoal for m0 m1
      using pmf_le_1[of "R1_OT12 (m0, m1) c0 â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view (m0, m1))" "Some True"]
        pmf_le_1[of "S1_OT12 (m0, m1) () â¤œ (Î»view. A1 view (m0, m1))" "Some True"]
      by simp
       apply simp
      apply(rule measure_spmf.integrable_const)
     apply clarify
     apply(rule OT_12_P1_assms_bound'[rule_format]) 
    by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma reduction_step2: 
  shows "âˆƒ A1. Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ =
          Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
            spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
proof-
  define A1' where "A1' == Î» (view :: 'v_OT121) (m0,m1). do {
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S2,S3) ();
    c :: 'v_OT121 â† R1_OT12 (S4, S5) c1;
    let R = (M, (S2,S3, m0, m1, S4, S5), a, view, c);
    D R}"
  have "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ =
       Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1))))) True -
        spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
  proof-
    have "(bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) = (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1)))))"
      unfolding R1_14_interm1_def R1_14_interm2_def A1'_def Let_def split_def
      apply(simp add: pair_spmf_alt_def) 
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      including monad_normalisation by(simp)
    also have "(bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) =  (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1)))))"
      unfolding R1_14_interm1_def R1_14_interm2_def A1'_def Let_def split_def
      apply(simp add: pair_spmf_alt_def) 
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      by(simp)  
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma reduction_step3: 
  shows "âˆƒ A1. Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14 M out) D) TrueÂ¦ =
          Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
            spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
proof-
  define A1' where "A1' == Î» (view :: 'v_OT121) (m0,m1). do {
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S2,S3) ();
    b :: 'v_OT121 â† S1_OT12 (S4, S5) ();
    let R = (M, (S2,S3, S4, S5,m0, m1), a, b, view);
    D R}"
  have "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14 M out) D) TrueÂ¦ =
       Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1))))) True -
        spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
  proof-
    have "(bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) = (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1)))))"
      unfolding  R1_14_interm2_def A1'_def Let_def split_def
      apply(simp add: pair_spmf_alt_def) 
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      including monad_normalisation by(simp)
    also have "(bind_spmf (S1_14 M out) D) = (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1' view (m0,m1)))))"
      unfolding S1_14_def Let_def A1'_def split_def
      apply(simp add: pair_spmf_alt_def) 
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
      including monad_normalisation by(simp)
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma reduction_P1_interm: 
  shows "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14 M (c0,c1)) (D)) True - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14 M out) (D)) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ 3 * adv_OT12"
    (is "?lhs â‰¤ ?rhs")
proof-
  have lhs: "?lhs â‰¤ Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ + 
                     Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ +
                      Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14 M out) D) TrueÂ¦"
    by simp
  obtain A1 where A1: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ =
                        Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c0) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                          spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
    using reduction_step1 by blast
  obtain A2 where A2: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm1 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) TrueÂ¦ = 
                        Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A2 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                          spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A2 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
    using reduction_step2 by blast
  obtain A3 where A3: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_interm2 M (c0, c1)) D) True - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14 M out) D) TrueÂ¦ =
                        Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A3 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                          spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A3 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
    using reduction_step3 by blast
  have lhs_bound: "?lhs â‰¤ Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c0) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                  spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦ + 
                   Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A2 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                    spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A2 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦ +
                     Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A3 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                      spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A3 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦"
    using A1 A2 A3 lhs by simp
  have bound1: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c0) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                  spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A1 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦ 
                      â‰¤ adv_OT12" 
    and bound2: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A2 view (m0,m1))))) True -
                  spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A2 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦ 
                      â‰¤ adv_OT12" 
    and bound3: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (R1_OT12 (m0,m1) c1) (Î» view. (A3 view (m0,m1))))) True -
        spmf (bind_spmf (pair_spmf coin_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»(m0, m1). bind_spmf (S1_OT12 (m0,m1) ()) (Î» view. (A3 view (m0,m1))))) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_OT12"
    using reduction_step1' by auto
  thus ?thesis
    using reduction_step1' lhs_bound by argo  
qed

lemma reduction_P1: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14 M (c0,c1)) (D)) True 
                        - spmf (funct_OT_14 M (c0,c1) â¤œ (Î» (out1,out2). S1_14 M out1 â¤œ (Î» view. D view))) TrueÂ¦ 
                              â‰¤ 3 * adv_OT12"
  by(simp add: funct_OT_14_def split_def Let_def reduction_P1_interm )

textâ€¹Party 2 security.â€º

lemma coin_coin: "map_spmf (Î» S0. S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1) coin_spmf = coin_spmf"
  (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have lhs: "?lhs = map_spmf (Î» S0. S0 âŠ• (S3 âŠ• m1)) coin_spmf" by blast
  also have op_eq: "... = map_spmf ((âŠ•) (S3 âŠ• m1)) coin_spmf" 
    by (metis xor_bool_def)
  also have "... = ?rhs" 
    using xor_uni_samp by fastforce
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using op_eq by auto
qed

lemma coin_coin': "map_spmf (Î» S3. S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1) coin_spmf = coin_spmf"
proof-
  have "map_spmf (Î» S3. S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1) coin_spmf = map_spmf (Î» S3. S3 âŠ• S0 âŠ• m1) coin_spmf" 
    by (metis xor_left_commute)
  thus ?thesis using coin_coin by simp
qed

definition R2_14:: "input1 â‡’ input2 â‡’ 'v_OT122 view2 spmf"
  where "R2_14 M C = do {
    let (m0,m1,m2,m3) = M;
    let (c0,c1) = C;
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a0 = S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• m0;
    let a1 = S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1;
    let a2 = S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m2;
    let a3 = S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• m3; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† R2_OT12 (S0,S1) c0;
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† R2_OT12 (S2,S3) c1;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† R2_OT12 (S4,S5) c1;
    return_spmf (C, (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"

lemma lossless_R2_14: "lossless_spmf (R2_14 M C)"
  by(simp add: R2_14_def split_def lossless_R2_12)

definition S2_14 :: "input2 â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT122 view2 spmf"
  where "S2_14 C out = do {
    let ((c0::bool),(c1::bool)) = C;
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a0' = (if ((Â¬ c0) âˆ§ (Â¬ c1)) then (S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• out) else a0);
    let a1' = (if ((Â¬ c0) âˆ§ c1) then (S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• out) else a1);
    let a2' = (if (c0 âˆ§ (Â¬ c1)) then (S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• out) else a2);
    let a3' = (if (c0 âˆ§ c1) then (S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• out) else a3);
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 (c0::bool) (if c0 then S1 else S0);
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 (c1::bool) (if c1 then S3 else S2);
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 (c1::bool) (if c1 then S5 else S4);
    return_spmf ((c0,c1), (a0',a1',a2',a3'), a,b,c)}"

lemma lossless_S2_14: "lossless_spmf (S2_14 c out)" 
  by(simp add: S2_14_def lossless_S2_12 split_def)

lemma P2_OT_14_FT: "R2_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (False,True) = funct_OT_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (False,True) â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S2_14 (False,True) out2)"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "R2_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (False,True) =  do {
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† map_spmf (Î» S2. S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• m0) coin_spmf;
    let a1 = S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1;
    a2 â† map_spmf (Î» S4. S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m2) coin_spmf;
    let a3 = S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• m3; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S0; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S3;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S5;
    return_spmf ((False,True), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def R2_14_def inf_th_OT12_P2 funct_OT_12_def OT_12_P2_assm)
  also have "... =  do {
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a1 = S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1;
    a2 â† coin_spmf;
    let a3 = S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• m3; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S0; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S3;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S5;
    return_spmf ((False,True), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    using coin_coin' by simp
  also have "... =  do {
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a1 = S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1;
    a2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a3 â† map_spmf (Î» S1. S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• m3) coin_spmf; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S0; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S3;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S5;
    return_spmf ((False,True), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
  also have "... =  do {
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S3 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S5 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a1 = S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1;
    a2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a3 â† coin_spmf; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S0; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S3;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S5;
    return_spmf ((False,True), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    using coin_coin by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by(simp add: funct_OT_14_def S2_14_def bind_spmf_const)
qed

lemma P2_OT_14_TF: "R2_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (True,False) = funct_OT_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (True,False) â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S2_14 (True,False) out2)"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "R2_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (True,False) = do {
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a0 = S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• m0;
    a1 :: bool â† map_spmf (Î» S3. S0 âŠ• S3 âŠ• m1) coin_spmf;
    let a2 = S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m2;
    a3 â† map_spmf (Î» S5. S1 âŠ• S5 âŠ• m3) coin_spmf; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S1; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S2;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S4;
    return_spmf ((True,False), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    apply(simp add: R2_14_def inf_th_OT12_P2 OT_12_P2_assm funct_OT_12_def Let_def)
    apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
    apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
    apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "âŒ‘ = _" bind_commute_spmf)
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
  also have "... = do {
    S0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a0 = S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• m0;
    a1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a2 = S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m2;
    a3 â† coin_spmf; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S1; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S2;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S4;
    return_spmf ((True,False), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    using coin_coin' by simp
  also have "... = do {
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† map_spmf (Î» S0. S0 âŠ• S2 âŠ• m0) coin_spmf;
    a1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a2 = S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m2;
    a3 â† coin_spmf; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S1; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S2;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S4;
    return_spmf ((True,False), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
  also have "... = do {
    S1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S2 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    S4 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a0 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    a1 :: bool â† coin_spmf;
    let a2 = S1 âŠ• S4 âŠ• m2;
    a3 â† coin_spmf; 
    a :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 True S1; 
    b :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S2;
    c :: 'v_OT122 â† S2_OT12 False S4;
    return_spmf ((True,False), (a0,a1,a2,a3), a,b,c)}"
    using coin_coin by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis
    apply(simp add: funct_OT_14_def S2_14_def bind_spmf_const)
    apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘"  in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
    apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
    apply(rewrite in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "bind_spmf _ âŒ‘" in "_ = âŒ‘" bind_commute_spmf)
    by simp
qed

lemma P2_sec_OT_14_split: "R2_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (c0,c1) = funct_OT_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (c0,c1) â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S2_14 (c0,c1) out2)"
  by(cases c0; cases c1; auto simp add: P2_OT_14_FF P2_OT_14_TF P2_OT_14_FT P2_OT_14_TT)

lemma P2_sec_OT_14: "R2_14 M C = funct_OT_14 M C â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S2_14 C out2)"
  by(metis P2_sec_OT_14_split surj_pair) 

sublocale OT_14: sim_det_def R1_14 S1_14 R2_14 S2_14 funct_OT_14 protocol_14_OT
  unfolding sim_det_def_def 
  by(simp add: lossless_R1_14 lossless_S1_14 lossless_funct_14_OT lossless_R2_14 lossless_S2_14 )

lemma correctness_OT_14: 
  shows "funct_OT_14 M C = protocol_14_OT M C"
proof-
  have "S1 = (S5 = (S1 = (S5 = d))) = d" for S1 S5 d by auto
  thus ?thesis
    by(cases "fst C"; cases "snd C"; simp add: funct_OT_14_def protocol_14_OT_def correct funct_OT_12_def lossless_funct_OT_12 bind_spmf_const split_def)
qed

lemma OT_14_correct: "OT_14.correctness M C"
  unfolding OT_14.correctness_def 
  using correctness_OT_14 by auto

lemma OT_14_P2_sec: "OT_14.perfect_sec_P2 m1 m2"
  unfolding OT_14.perfect_sec_P2_def
  using P2_sec_OT_14 by blast

lemma OT_14_P1_sec: "OT_14.adv_P1 m1 m2 D â‰¤ 3 * adv_OT12"
  unfolding OT_14.adv_P1_def  
  by (metis reduction_P1 surj_pair) 

end

locale OT_14_asymp = sim_det_def +
  fixes S1_OT12 :: "nat â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) â‡’ unit â‡’ 'v_OT121 spmf"
    and R1_OT12 :: "nat â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT121 spmf" 
    and adv_OT12 :: "nat â‡’ real"
    and S2_OT12 :: "nat â‡’ bool â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT122 spmf" 
    and R2_OT12 :: "nat â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_OT122 spmf"
    and protocol_OT12 :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ (unit Ã— bool) spmf"
  assumes ot14_base: "â‹€ (n::nat). ot14_base (S1_OT12 n) (R1_12_0T n) (adv_OT12 n) (S2_OT12 n) (R2_12OT n) (protocol_OT12)"
begin 

sublocale ot14_base "(S1_OT12 n)" "(R1_12_0T n)" "(adv_OT12 n)" "(S2_OT12 n)" "(R2_12OT n)" using local.ot14_base by simp

lemma OT_14_P1_sec: "OT_14.adv_P1 (R1_12_0T n) n m1 m2 D â‰¤ 3 * (adv_OT12 n)"
  unfolding OT_14.adv_P1_def using reduction_P1 surj_pair by metis

theorem OT_14_P1_asym_sec: "negligible (Î» n. OT_14.adv_P1 (R1_12_0T n) n m1 m2 D)" if "negligible (Î» n. adv_OT12 n)"
proof-
  have adv_neg: "negligible (Î»n. 3 * adv_OT12 n)" using that negligible_cmultI by simp
  have "Â¦OT_14.adv_P1 (R1_12_0T n) n m1 m2 DÂ¦ â‰¤ Â¦3 * (adv_OT12 n)Â¦" for n 
  proof -
    have "Â¦OT_14.adv_P1 (R1_12_0T n) n m1 m2 DÂ¦ â‰¤ 3 * adv_OT12 n"
      using OT_14.adv_P1_def OT_14_P1_sec by auto
    then show ?thesis
      by (meson abs_ge_self order_trans)
  qed
  thus ?thesis using OT_14_P1_sec negligible_le adv_neg 
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) negligible_absI)
qed

theorem OT_14_P2_asym_sec: "OT_14.perfect_sec_P2 R2_OT12 n m1 m2"
  using OT_14_P2_sec by simp

end

end

Theory GMW

subsection â€¹1-out-of-4 OT to GMWâ€º

textâ€¹We prove security for the gates of the GMW protocol in the semi honest model. We assume security on
1-out-of-4 OT.â€º

theory GMW imports
  OT14
begin

type_synonym share_1 = bool 
type_synonym share_2 = bool

type_synonym shares_1 = "bool list"
type_synonym shares_2 = "bool list"

type_synonym msgs_14_OT = "(bool Ã— bool Ã— bool Ã— bool)"
type_synonym choice_14_OT = "(bool Ã— bool)"

type_synonym share_wire = "(share_1 Ã— share_2)"

locale gmw_base =
  fixes S1_14_OT :: "msgs_14_OT â‡’ unit â‡’ 'v_14_OT1 spmf" â€• â€¹simulated view for party 1 of OT14â€º
    and R1_14_OT :: "msgs_14_OT â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ 'v_14_OT1 spmf" â€• â€¹real view for party 1 of OT14â€º
    and S2_14_OT :: "choice_14_OT â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_14_OT2 spmf" 
    and R2_14_OT :: "msgs_14_OT â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ 'v_14_OT2 spmf"
    and protocol_14_OT :: "msgs_14_OT â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ (unit Ã— bool) spmf"
    and adv_14_OT :: real
  assumes P1_OT_14_adv_bound: "sim_det_def.adv_P1 R1_14_OT S1_14_OT funct_14_OT M C D â‰¤ adv_14_OT" â€• â€¹bound the advantage of party 1 in the 1-out-of-4 OTâ€º
    and P2_OT_12_inf_theoretic: "sim_det_def.perfect_sec_P2 R2_14_OT S2_14_OT funct_14_OT M C" â€• â€¹information theoretic security for party 2 in the 1-out-of-4 OTâ€º
    and correct_14: "funct_OT_14 msgs C = protocol_14_OT msgs C" â€• â€¹correctness of the 1-out-of-4 OTâ€º
    and lossless_R1_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (R1_14_OT (m1,m2,m3,m4) (c0,c1))"
    and lossless_R2_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (R2_14_OT (m1,m2,m3,m4) (c0,c1))"
    and lossless_S1_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (S1_14_OT (m1,m2,m3,m4) ())"
    and lossless_S2_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (S2_14_OT (c0,c1) b)"
    and lossless_protocol_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (protocol_14_OT S C)" 
    and lossless_funct_14_OT: "lossless_spmf (funct_14_OT M C)"
begin

lemma  funct_14: "funct_OT_14 (m00,m01,m10,m11) (c0,c1) 
                      = return_spmf ((),if c0 then (if c1 then m11 else m10) else (if c1 then m01 else m00))"
  by(simp add: funct_OT_14_def)

sublocale OT_14_sim: sim_det_def R1_14_OT S1_14_OT R2_14_OT S2_14_OT funct_14_OT protocol_14_OT
  unfolding sim_det_def_def 
  by(simp add: lossless_R1_14_OT lossless_S1_14_OT lossless_funct_14_OT lossless_R2_14_OT lossless_S2_14_OT)

lemma inf_th_14_OT_P4: "R2_14_OT msgs C = (funct_OT_14 msgs C â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). S2_14_OT C s2))" 
  using P2_OT_12_inf_theoretic sim_det_def.perfect_sec_P2_def OT_14_sim.perfect_sec_P2_def by auto

lemma ass_adv_14_OT: "Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14_OT msgs ()) (Î» view. (D view))) True - 
                    spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_OT msgs (c0,c1)) (Î» view. (D view))) True Â¦ â‰¤ adv_14_OT"
  (is "?lhs â‰¤ adv_14_OT")
proof-
  have "funct_OT_14 (m0,m1,m2,m3) (c0, c1) â¤œ (Î»(o1, o2). S1_14_OT (m0,m1,m2,m3) () â¤œ D) = S1_14_OT (m0,m1,m2,m3) () â¤œ D" 
    for m0 m1 m2 m3 by(simp add: funct_14)
  hence funct: "funct_OT_14 msgs (c0, c1) â¤œ (Î»(o1, o2). S1_14_OT msgs () â¤œ D) = S1_14_OT msgs () â¤œ D" 
    by (metis prod_cases4)
  have "?lhs = Â¦spmf (bind_spmf (R1_14_OT msgs (c0,c1)) (Î» view. (D view))) True 
                  - spmf (bind_spmf (S1_14_OT msgs ()) (Î» view. (D view))) TrueÂ¦"
    by linarith
  hence "... = Â¦(spmf (R1_14_OT msgs (c0,c1) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) True) 
            - spmf (funct_OT_14 msgs (c0,c1) â¤œ (Î» (o1, o2). S1_14_OT msgs o1 â¤œ (Î» view. D view))) TrueÂ¦" 
    by(simp add: funct)
  thus ?thesis using P1_OT_14_adv_bound sim_det_def.adv_P1_def 
    by (simp add: OT_14_sim.adv_P1_def abs_minus_commute)
qed

text â€¹The sharing schemeâ€º

definition share :: "bool â‡’ share_wire spmf"
  where "share x = do {
    aâ‡©1 â† coin_spmf;
    let bâ‡©1 = x âŠ• aâ‡©1;
    return_spmf (aâ‡©1, bâ‡©1)}" 

lemma lossless_share [simp]: "lossless_spmf (share x)" 
  by(simp add: share_def)

definition reconstruct :: "(share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ bool spmf"
  where "reconstruct shares = do {
    let (a,b) = shares;
    return_spmf (a âŠ• b)}"

lemma lossless_reconstruct [simp]: "lossless_spmf (reconstruct s)" 
  by(simp add: reconstruct_def split_def)

lemma reconstruct_share : "(bind_spmf (share x) reconstruct) = (return_spmf x)"
proof-
  have "y = (y = x) = x" for y by auto
  thus ?thesis 
    by(auto simp add: share_def reconstruct_def bind_spmf_const eq_commute)  
qed

lemma "(reconstruct (s1,s2) â¤œ (Î» rec. share rec â¤œ (Î» shares. reconstruct shares))) = return_spmf (s1 âŠ• s2)"
  apply(simp add: reconstruct_share reconstruct_def share_def)
  apply(cases s1; cases s2) by(auto simp add: bind_spmf_const)

definition xor_evaluate ::  "bool â‡’ bool â‡’ bool spmf"
  where "xor_evaluate A B = return_spmf (A âŠ• B)"

definition xor_funct :: "share_wire â‡’ share_wire â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "xor_funct A B = do {
    let (a1, b1) = A;
    let (a2,b2) = B;
    return_spmf (a1 âŠ• a2, b1 âŠ• b2)}"

lemma lossless_xor_funct: "lossless_spmf (xor_funct A B)"
  by(simp add: xor_funct_def split_def)

definition xor_protocol :: "share_wire â‡’ share_wire â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "xor_protocol A B = do {
    let (a1, b1) = A;
    let (a2,b2) = B;
    return_spmf (a1 âŠ• a2, b1 âŠ• b2)}"

lemma lossless_xor_protocol: "lossless_spmf (xor_protocol A B)"
  by(simp add: xor_protocol_def split_def)

lemma share_xor_reconstruct: 
  shows "share x â¤œ (Î» w1. share y â¤œ (Î» w2. xor_protocol w1 w2 
              â¤œ (Î» (a, b). reconstruct (a, b)))) = xor_evaluate x y"
proof-
  have "(ya = (Â¬ yb)) = ((x = (Â¬ ya)) = (y = (Â¬ yb))) = (x = (Â¬ y))" for ya yb
    by auto
  then show ?thesis
    by(simp add: share_def xor_protocol_def reconstruct_def xor_evaluate_def bind_spmf_const)
qed

definition R1_xor :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "R1_xor A B = return_spmf A"

lemma lossless_R1_xor: "lossless_spmf (R1_xor A B)" 
  by(simp add: R1_xor_def)

definition S1_xor :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "S1_xor A out  = return_spmf A"

lemma lossless_S1_xor: "lossless_spmf (S1_xor A out)" 
  by(simp add: S1_xor_def)

lemma P1_xor_inf_th: "R1_xor A B = xor_funct A B â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S1_xor A out1)"
  by(simp add: R1_xor_def xor_funct_def S1_xor_def split_def)

definition R2_xor :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "R2_xor A B = return_spmf B"

lemma lossless_R2_xor: "lossless_spmf (R2_xor A B)" 
  by(simp add: R2_xor_def)

definition S2_xor :: "(bool Ã— bool) â‡’ bool â‡’ (bool Ã— bool) spmf"
  where "S2_xor B out  = return_spmf B"

lemma lossless_S2_xor: "lossless_spmf (S2_xor A out)" 
  by(simp add: S2_xor_def)

lemma P2_xor_inf_th: "R2_xor A B = xor_funct A B â¤œ (Î» (out1, out2). S2_xor B out2)"
  by(simp add: R2_xor_def xor_funct_def S2_xor_def split_def)

sublocale xor_sim_det: sim_det_def  R1_xor S1_xor R2_xor S2_xor xor_funct xor_protocol 
  unfolding sim_det_def_def
  by(simp add: lossless_R1_xor lossless_S1_xor lossless_R2_xor lossless_S2_xor lossless_xor_funct)

lemma "xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P1 m1 m2"
  by(simp add: xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P1_def P1_xor_inf_th)

lemma "xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P2 m1 m2"
  by(simp add: xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P2_def P2_xor_inf_th)

definition and_funct :: "(share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ (share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ share_wire spmf"
  where "and_funct A B = do {
    let (a1, a2) = A;
    let (b1,b2) = B;
    Ïƒ â† coin_spmf;
    return_spmf (Ïƒ, Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• b1) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• b2)))}"

lemma lossless_and_funct: "lossless_spmf (and_funct A B)"
  by(simp add: and_funct_def split_def)

definition and_evaluate :: "bool â‡’ bool â‡’ bool spmf"
  where "and_evaluate A B  = return_spmf (A âˆ§ B)"

definition and_protocol :: "share_wire â‡’ share_wire â‡’ share_wire spmf"
  where "and_protocol A B = do {
    let (a1, b1) = A;
    let (a2,b2) = B;
    Ïƒ â† coin_spmf;
    let s0 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (b1 âŠ• False));   
    let s1 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (b1 âŠ• True));   
    let s2 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (b1 âŠ• False));   
    let s3 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (b1 âŠ• True)); 
    (_, s) â† protocol_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) (a2,b2);
    return_spmf (Ïƒ, s)}" 

lemma lossless_and_protocol: "lossless_spmf (and_protocol A B)"
  by(simp add: and_protocol_def split_def lossless_protocol_14_OT)

lemma and_correct: "and_protocol (a1, b1) (a2,b2) = and_funct (a1, b1) (a2,b2)"
  apply(simp add: and_protocol_def and_funct_def correct_14[symmetric] funct_14)
  by(cases b2 ; cases b1; cases a1; cases a2; auto)

lemma share_and_reconstruct: 
  shows "share x â¤œ (Î» (a1,a2). share y â¤œ (Î» (b1,b2).
             and_protocol (a1,b1) (a2,b2) â¤œ (Î» (a, b). reconstruct (a, b)))) = and_evaluate x y"
proof-
  have "(yc = (Â¬ (if x = (Â¬ ya) then if snd (snd (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), snd (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))) then yc 
            = (fst (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))) âˆ¨ snd (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))))
                   else yc = (fst (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))) âˆ¨ Â¬ snd (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))))
                       else if snd (snd (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), snd (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))) then yc = (fst (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))) 
                            âŸ¶ snd (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))))
                                  else yc = (fst (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))) 
                                      âŸ¶ Â¬ snd (fst (ya, x = (Â¬ ya)), fst (yb, y = (Â¬ yb))))))) = (x âˆ§ y)"
    for yc yb ya by auto
  then show ?thesis 
    by(auto simp add: share_def reconstruct_def and_protocol_def and_evaluate_def split_def correct_14[symmetric] funct_14 bind_spmf_const Let_def)
qed

definition and_R1 :: "(share_1 Ã— share_1) â‡’ (share_2 Ã— share_2) â‡’ (((share_1 Ã— share_1) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1)  Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) spmf"
  where "and_R1 A B = do {
    let (a1, a2) = A;
    let (b1,b2) = B;
    Ïƒ â† coin_spmf;
    let s0 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s1 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True));   
    let s2 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s3 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)); 
    V â† R1_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) (b1,b2);
    (_, s) â† protocol_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) (b1,b2);
    return_spmf (((a1,a2), Ïƒ, V), (Ïƒ, s))}"

lemma lossless_and_R1: "lossless_spmf (and_R1 A B)"
  apply(simp add: and_R1_def split_def lossless_R1_14_OT lossless_protocol_14_OT Let_def)
  by (metis prod.collapse lossless_R1_14_OT)

definition S1_and :: "(share_1 Ã— share_1) â‡’ bool â‡’ (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1)) spmf"
  where "S1_and A Ïƒ = do {
    let (a1,a2) = A;
    let s0 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s1 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True));   
    let s2 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s3 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)); 
    V â† S1_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) ();
    return_spmf ((a1,a2), Ïƒ, V)}"

definition out1 :: "(share_1 Ã— share_1) â‡’ (share_2 Ã— share_2) â‡’ bool â‡’ (share_1 Ã— share_2) spmf"
  where "out1 A B Ïƒ = do {
    let (a1,a2) = A;
    let (b1,b2) = B;
    return_spmf (Ïƒ, Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• b1) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• b2)))}"

definition S1_and' :: "(share_1 Ã— share_1) â‡’ (share_2 Ã— share_2) â‡’ bool â‡’ (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) spmf"
  where "S1_and' A B Ïƒ = do {
    let (a1,a2) = A;
    let (b1,b2) = B;
    let s0 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s1 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True));   
    let s2 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s3 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)); 
    V â† S1_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) ();
    return_spmf (((a1,a2), Ïƒ, V), (Ïƒ, Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• b1) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• b2))))}"

lemma sec_ex_P1_and: 
  shows "âˆƒ (A :: 'v_14_OT1 â‡’ bool â‡’ bool spmf).
          Â¦spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) 
            â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) â‡’ bool spmf))) True - spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦ =
              Â¦spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. S1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) () 
                â¤œ  (Î» view. A view Ïƒ))) True 
                  - spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. R1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) (b1, b2) 
                    â¤œ (Î» view. A view Ïƒ))) TrueÂ¦"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  define A' where "A' == Î» view Ïƒ.  (D (((a1,a2), Ïƒ, view), (Ïƒ, Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• b1) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• b2)))))" 
  have "Â¦spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) 
          â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) â‡’ bool spmf))) True - 
            spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (bool Ã— bool)) â‡’ bool spmf)) TrueÂ¦ =
              Â¦spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ :: bool. S1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) () 
                â¤œ  (Î» view. A' view Ïƒ))) True - spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. R1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) (b1, b2) 
                  â¤œ (Î» view. A' view Ïƒ))) TrueÂ¦"
    by(auto simp add: S1_and'_def A'_def and_funct_def and_R1_def Let_def split_def correct_14[symmetric] funct_14; cases a1; cases a2; cases b1; cases b2; auto)
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma bound_14_OT:
  "Â¦spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. S1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) () 
        â¤œ  (Î» view. (A :: 'v_14_OT1 â‡’ bool â‡’ bool spmf) view Ïƒ))) True - spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. R1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) (b1, b2) 
              â¤œ (Î» view. A view Ïƒ))) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_14_OT"
  (is "?lhs â‰¤ adv_14_OT")
proof-
  have int1: "integrable (measure_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»x. spmf (S1_14_OT (x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True)) () â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) True)"
    and int2: "integrable (measure_spmf coin_spmf) (Î»x. spmf (R1_14_OT (x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True)) (b1, b2) â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) True)"
    by(rule measure_spmf.integrable_const_bound[where B=1]; simp add: pmf_le_1)+
  have "?lhs = Â¦LINT x|measure_spmf coin_spmf.
        spmf (S1_14_OT (x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True)) () â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) True -
        spmf (R1_14_OT (x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• False âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• False), x âŠ• (a1 âŠ• True âˆ§ a2 âŠ• True)) (b1, b2) â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) TrueÂ¦"
    apply(subst (1 2) spmf_bind) using int1 int2 by simp
  also have "... â‰¤ LINT x|measure_spmf coin_spmf. Â¦spmf (S1_14_OT (x = (a1 âŸ¶ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âŸ¶ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ a2)) () â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) True 
                - spmf (R1_14_OT (x = (a1 âŸ¶ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âŸ¶ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ a2)) (b1, b2) â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) TrueÂ¦"
    by(rule integral_abs_bound[THEN order_trans]; simp add: split_beta)
  ultimately have "?lhs â‰¤ LINT x|measure_spmf coin_spmf. Â¦spmf (S1_14_OT (x = (a1 âŸ¶ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âŸ¶ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ a2)) () â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) True 
                - spmf (R1_14_OT (x = (a1 âŸ¶ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âŸ¶ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ a2)) (b1, b2) â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) TrueÂ¦"
    by simp
  also have "LINT x|measure_spmf coin_spmf. Â¦spmf (S1_14_OT (x = (a1 âŸ¶ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âŸ¶ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ a2)) () â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) True 
                - spmf (R1_14_OT (x = (a1 âŸ¶ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âŸ¶ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ Â¬ a2), x = (a1 âˆ¨ a2)) (b1, b2) â¤œ (Î»view. A view x)) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_14_OT"
    apply(rule integral_mono[THEN order_trans]) 
       apply(rule measure_spmf.integrable_const_bound[where B=2])
        apply clarsimp
        apply(rule abs_triangle_ineq4[THEN order_trans])
        apply(cases a1) apply(cases a2) 
    subgoal for M
      using pmf_le_1[of "R1_14_OT (Â¬ M, M, M, M) (b1,b2) â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"]
        pmf_le_1[of "S1_14_OT (Â¬ M, M, M, M) () â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
      by simp
    subgoal for M 
      using pmf_le_1[of "R1_14_OT  (M, Â¬ M, M, M) (b1,b2) â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
        pmf_le_1[of "S1_14_OT (M, Â¬ M, M, M) () â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
      by simp
        apply(cases a2) apply(auto)
    subgoal for M
      using pmf_le_1[of "R1_14_OT  (M, M, Â¬ M, M) (b1,b2) â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
        pmf_le_1[of "S1_14_OT (M, M, Â¬ M, M) () â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
      by(simp)
    subgoal for M
      using pmf_le_1[of "R1_14_OT  (M, M, M, Â¬ M) (b1,b2) â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
        pmf_le_1[of "S1_14_OT (M, M, M, Â¬ M) () â¤œ  (Î» view. A view M)" "Some True"] 
      by(simp)
    using ass_adv_14_OT by fast
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma security_and_P1:
  shows "Â¦spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) 
              â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) â‡’ bool spmf))) True - 
                    spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_14_OT"
proof-
  obtain A :: "'v_14_OT1 â‡’ bool â‡’ bool spmf" where A: 
    "Â¦spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) â¤œ D)) True - spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦ =
       Â¦spmf (coin_spmf â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. S1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) () 
         â¤œ  (Î» view. A view Ïƒ))) True - spmf (coin_spmf 
           â¤œ (Î» Ïƒ. R1_14_OT ((Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False))), (Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)))) (b1, b2)
             â¤œ (Î» view. A view Ïƒ))) TrueÂ¦" 
    using sec_ex_P1_and by blast
  then show ?thesis using bound_14_OT[of "a1" "a2" "A" "b1" "b2" ] by metis
qed

lemma security_and_P1':
  shows "Â¦spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ D) True - 
           spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) 
            â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) â‡’ bool spmf))) TrueÂ¦ â‰¤ adv_14_OT"
proof-
  have "Â¦spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ D) True - 
          spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) 
            â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) â‡’ bool spmf))) TrueÂ¦ =
              Â¦spmf ((and_funct (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ (Î» (s1, s2). (S1_and' (a1,a2) (b1,b2) s1) 
                â¤œ (D :: (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— bool Ã— 'v_14_OT1) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) â‡’ bool spmf))) True - 
                  spmf ((and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1,b2)) â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦" using abs_minus_commute by blast
  thus ?thesis using security_and_P1 by simp
qed

definition and_R2 :: "(share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ (share_2 Ã— share_1) â‡’ (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— 'v_14_OT2) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) spmf"
  where "and_R2 A B = do {
    let (a1, a2) = A;
    let (b1,b2) = B;
    Ïƒ â† coin_spmf;
    let s0 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s1 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• False) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True));   
    let s2 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• False));   
    let s3 = Ïƒ âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• True) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• True)); 
    (_, s) â† protocol_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) B;
    V â† R2_14_OT (s0,s1,s2,s3) B;
    return_spmf ((B, V), (Ïƒ, s))}"

lemma lossless_and_R2: "lossless_spmf (and_R2 A B)"
  apply(simp add: and_R2_def split_def lossless_R2_14_OT lossless_protocol_14_OT Let_def) 
  by (metis lossless_R2_14_OT prod.collapse)

definition S2_and :: "(share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ bool â‡’ (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— 'v_14_OT2)) spmf"
  where "S2_and B s2 =  do {
    let (a2,b2) = B;
    V :: 'v_14_OT2 â† S2_14_OT (a2,b2) s2;
    return_spmf ((B, V))}"

definition out2 :: "(share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ (share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ bool â‡’ (share_1 Ã— share_2) spmf"
  where "out2 B A s2 = do {
    let (a1, b1) = A;
    let (a2,b2) = B;
    let s1 = s2 âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• a2) âˆ§ (b1 âŠ• b2));
    return_spmf (s1, s2)}"

definition S2_and' :: "(share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ (share_1 Ã— share_2) â‡’ bool â‡’ (((bool Ã— bool) Ã— 'v_14_OT2) Ã— (share_1 Ã— share_2)) spmf"
  where "S2_and' B A s2 =  do {
    let (a1, a2) = A;
    let (b1,b2) = B;
    V :: 'v_14_OT2 â† S2_14_OT B s2;
    let s1 = s2 âŠ• ((a1 âŠ• b1) âˆ§ (a2 âŠ• b2));
    return_spmf ((B, V), s1, s2)}"

lemma lossless_S2_and: "lossless_spmf (S2_and B s2)"
  apply(simp add: S2_and_def split_def)
  by(metis prod.collapse lossless_S2_14_OT) 

sublocale and_secret_sharing: sim_non_det_def and_R1 S1_and out1 and_R2 S2_and out2 and_funct .

lemma ideal_S1_and: "and_secret_sharing.Ideal1 (a1, b1) (a2, b2) s2 = S1_and' (a1, b1) (a2, b2) s2"
  by(simp add: Let_def and_secret_sharing.Ideal1_def S1_and'_def split_def out1_def S1_and_def)

lemma and_P2_security: "and_secret_sharing.perfect_sec_P2 m1 m2"
proof-
  have "and_R2 (a1, b1) (a2, b2) = and_funct (a1, b1) (a2, b2) â¤œ (Î»(s1, s2). and_secret_sharing.Ideal2 (a2, b2) (a1, b1) s2)"
    for a1 a2 b1 b2
    apply(auto simp add: split_def inf_th_14_OT_P4  S2_and'_def and_R2_def and_funct_def Let_def correct_14[symmetric] and_secret_sharing.Ideal2_def S2_and_def out2_def)
    apply(simp only: funct_14) 
    apply auto
    by(cases b1;cases b2; cases a1; cases a2; auto) 
  thus ?thesis
    by(simp add: and_secret_sharing.perfect_sec_P2_def; metis  prod.collapse)
qed

lemma and_P1_security: "and_secret_sharing.adv_P1 m1 m2 D â‰¤ adv_14_OT"
proof-
  have "Â¦spmf (and_R1 (a1, a2) (b1, b2) â¤œ D) True -
            spmf (and_funct (a1, a2) (b1, b2) â¤œ (Î»(s1, s2). 
                and_secret_sharing.Ideal1 (a1, a2) (b1, b2) s1 â¤œ D)) TrueÂ¦
                    â‰¤ adv_14_OT" for a1 a2 b1 b2 
    using security_and_P1' ideal_S1_and prod.collapse by simp 
  thus ?thesis 
    by(simp add:  and_secret_sharing.adv_P1_def; metis prod.collapse)
qed

definition "F = {and_evaluate, xor_evaluate}"

lemma share_reconstruct_xor: "share x â¤œ (Î»(a1, a2). share y â¤œ (Î»(b1, b2). 
          xor_protocol (a1, b1) (a2, b2) â¤œ (Î»(a, b). 
              reconstruct (a, b)))) = xor_evaluate x y"
proof-
  have "(((ya = (x = ya)) = (yb = (y = (Â¬ yb))))) = (x = (Â¬ y))" for ya yb by auto
  thus ?thesis
    by(simp add: xor_protocol_def share_def reconstruct_def xor_evaluate_def bind_spmf_const)
qed

sublocale share_correct: secret_sharing_scheme share reconstruct F .

lemma "share_correct.sharing_correct input"
  by(simp add: share_correct.sharing_correct_def reconstruct_share) 

lemma "share_correct.correct_share_eval input1 input2"
  unfolding share_correct.correct_share_eval_def
  apply(auto simp add: F_def) 
  using share_and_reconstruct apply auto 
  using share_reconstruct_xor by force

end 

locale gmw_asym =
  fixes S1_14_OT :: "nat â‡’ msgs_14_OT â‡’ unit â‡’ 'v_14_OT1 spmf"
    and R1_14_OT :: "nat â‡’ msgs_14_OT â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ 'v_14_OT1 spmf"
    and S2_14_OT :: "nat â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ bool â‡’ 'v_14_OT2 spmf" 
    and R2_14_OT :: "nat â‡’ msgs_14_OT â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ 'v_14_OT2 spmf"
    and protocol_14_OT :: "nat â‡’ msgs_14_OT â‡’ choice_14_OT â‡’ (unit Ã— bool) spmf"
    and adv_14_OT :: "nat â‡’ real"
  assumes gmw_base: "â‹€ (n::nat). gmw_base (S1_14_OT n) (R1_14_OT n) (S2_14_OT n) (R2_14_OT n) (protocol_14_OT n) (adv_14_OT n)"
begin

sublocale gmw_base "(S1_14_OT n)" "(R1_14_OT n)" "(S2_14_OT n)" "(R2_14_OT n)" "(protocol_14_OT n)" "(adv_14_OT n)"
  by (simp add: gmw_base)

lemma "xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P1 m1 m2" 
  by (simp add: P1_xor_inf_th xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P1_def)

lemma "xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P2 m1 m2"
  by (simp add: P2_xor_inf_th xor_sim_det.perfect_sec_P2_def)

lemma and_P1_adv_negligible:
  assumes "negligible (Î» n. adv_14_OT n)"
  shows "negligible (Î» n. and_secret_sharing.adv_P1 n m1 m2 D)" 
proof-
  have "and_secret_sharing.adv_P1 n m1 m2 D â‰¤ adv_14_OT n" for n
    by (simp add: and_P1_security)
  thus ?thesis 
    using and_secret_sharing.adv_P1_def assms negligible_le by auto
qed

lemma and_P2_security: "and_secret_sharing.perfect_sec_P2 n m1 m2" 
  by (simp add: and_P2_security)

end

end

Theory Secure_Multiplication

subsection â€¹Secure multiplication protocolâ€º

theory Secure_Multiplication imports
  CryptHOL.Cyclic_Group_SPMF   
  Uniform_Sampling 
  Semi_Honest_Def
begin

locale secure_mult =
  fixes q :: nat
  assumes q_gt_0: "q > 0"
    and "prime q"
begin

type_synonym real_view = "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ ((nat Ã— nat Ã— nat Ã— nat) Ã— nat Ã— nat) spmf"
type_synonym sim = "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ ((nat Ã— nat Ã— nat Ã— nat) Ã— nat Ã— nat) spmf"

lemma samp_uni_set_spmf [simp]: "set_spmf (sample_uniform q) = {..< q}" 
  by(simp add: sample_uniform_def)

definition funct :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat) spmf"
  where "funct x y = do {
    s â† sample_uniform q;
    return_spmf (s, (x*y + (q - s)) mod q)}"

definition TI :: "((nat Ã— nat) Ã— (nat Ã— nat)) spmf"
  where "TI = do {
    a â† sample_uniform q;  
    b â† sample_uniform q;
    r â† sample_uniform q;
    return_spmf ((a, r), (b, ((a*b + (q - r)) mod q)))}"

definition out :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat) spmf"
  where "out x y = do {
    ((c1,d1),(c2,d2)) â† TI;
    let e2 = (x + c1) mod q;
    let e1 = (y + (q - c2)) mod q;
    return_spmf (((x*e1 + (q - d1)) mod q), ((e2 * c2 + (q - d2)) mod q))}"

definition R1 :: "real_view"
  where "R1 x y = do {
    ((c1, d1), (c2, d2)) â† TI;
    let e2 = (x + c1) mod q;
    let e1 = (y + (q - c2)) mod q;
    let s1 = (x*e1 + (q - d1)) mod q;
    let s2 = (e2 * c2 + (q - d2)) mod q;
    return_spmf ((x, c1, d1, e1), s1, s2)}"

definition S1 :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat Ã— nat Ã— nat) spmf" 
  where "S1 x s1 = do {
    a :: nat â† sample_uniform q;  
    e1 â† sample_uniform q;
    let d1 = (x*e1 + (q - s1)) mod q;
    return_spmf (x, a, d1, e1)}"

definition Out1 :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat) spmf"
  where "Out1 x y s1 = do {
    let s2 = (x*y + (q - s1)) mod q;
    return_spmf (s1,s2)}"

definition R2 :: "real_view"
  where "R2 x y = do {
    ((c1, d1), (c2, d2)) â† TI;
    let e2 = (x + c1) mod q;
    let e1 = (y + (q - c2)) mod q;
    let s1 = (x*e1 + (q - d1)) mod q;
    let s2 = (e2 * c2 + (q - d2)) mod q;
    return_spmf ((y, c2, d2, e2), s1, s2)}"

definition S2 :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat Ã— nat Ã— nat) spmf"
  where "S2 y s2 = do { 
    b â† sample_uniform q;
    e2 â† sample_uniform q;
    let d2 = (e2*b + (q - s2)) mod q;
    return_spmf (y, b, d2, e2)}"

definition Out2 :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat) spmf"
  where "Out2 y x s2 = do {
    let s1 = (x*y + (q - s2)) mod q;
    return_spmf (s1,s2)}"

definition Ideal2 :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ ((nat Ã— nat Ã— nat Ã— nat) Ã— (nat Ã— nat)) spmf"
  where "Ideal2 y x out2 = do {
    view2 :: (nat Ã— nat Ã— nat Ã— nat) â† S2 y out2;
    out2 â† Out2 y x out2;
    return_spmf (view2, out2)}"

sublocale sim_non_det_def: sim_non_det_def R1 S1 Out1 R2 S2 Out2 funct .

lemma minus_mod:
  assumes "a > b"
  shows "[a - b mod q = a - b] (mod q)"
  by(metis cong_diff_nat  cong_def le_trans less_or_eq_imp_le assms mod_less_eq_dividend mod_mod_trivial)

lemma q_cong:"[a = q + a] (mod q)" 
  by (simp add: cong_def)
