lemma P2_ideal_view_unfold: "mal_def.ideal_view_2 (x0,x1) Ïƒ z (P2_S1, P2_S2) ğ’œ = P2_ideal_model (x0,x1) Ïƒ z ğ’œ"
  unfolding local.mal_def.ideal_view_2_def P2_ideal_model_def local.mal_def.ideal_game_2_def P2_S1_def P2_S2_def 
  by(auto simp add: Let_def split_def) 

end 

locale ot = ot_base + cyclic_group ğ’¢
begin

lemma P1_assert_correct1: 
  shows "((â™g [^] (Î±0::nat)) [^] (r::nat) âŠ— â™g âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] (Î±1::nat)) [^] r âŠ— â™g) 
                = (â™g [^] Î±0 âŠ— inv (â™g [^] Î±1)) [^] r)"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have in_carrier1: "(â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
  have in_carrier2: "inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
  have 1:"?lhs = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— â™g âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r) âŠ— inv â™g"  
    using  cyclic_group_assoc nat_pow_pow inverse_split in_carrier1 by simp
  also have 2:"... = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— (â™g âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r)) âŠ— inv â™g"
    using cyclic_group_assoc in_carrier2 by simp
  also have "... = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— (inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r) âŠ— â™g) âŠ— inv â™g" 
    using in_carrier2 cyclic_group_commute by simp
  also have 3: "... = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r) âŠ— (â™g âŠ— inv â™g)"
    using cyclic_group_assoc in_carrier2 by simp
  also have "... = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r)" by simp
  also have "... = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1)) [^] r" 
    using inverse_pow_pow by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (simp add: cyclic_group_commute pow_mult_distrib)
qed

lemma P1_assert_correct2: 
  shows   "(â™g [^] (Î±0::nat)) [^] (r::nat) âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] (Î±1::nat)) [^] r) = (â™g [^] Î±0 âŠ— inv (â™g [^] Î±1)) [^] r"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have in_carrier2:"â™g [^] Î±1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
  hence "?lhs = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1)) [^] r" 
    using inverse_pow_pow by simp
  thus ?thesis
    by (simp add: cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI pow_mult_distrib)
qed

sublocale ddh: ddh_ext  
  by (simp add: cyclic_group_axioms ddh_ext.intro)

lemma P1_real_ddh0_Ïƒ_false:
  assumes "Ïƒ = False"
  shows "((P1_real_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = (ddh.DDH0 (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false M z ğ’œ D))"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have 
    "(in2 = â™g [^] (r::nat) âˆ§ in3 = in1 [^] r âˆ§ in1 = â™g [^] (Î±0::nat) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (Î±1::nat)) 
        âˆ§ in2 = â™g [^] r âˆ§ in3 = (â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0 âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r))
          âŸ· (in1 = â™g [^] Î±0 âŠ— inv (â™g [^] Î±1) âˆ§ in2 = â™g [^] r âˆ§ in3 
            = (â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0 âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r))"  
    for in1 in2 in3 r Î±0 Î±1 
    by (auto simp add: P1_assert_correct2 power_swap)
  moreover have "((P1_real_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    r â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let h0 = â™g [^] Î±0;
    let h1 = â™g [^] Î±1;
    let a = â™g [^] r;
    let b0 = (â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0;
    let b1 = h1 [^] r;
    ((in1, in2, in3),s) â† ğ’œ1 M h0 h1 a b0 b1 z;
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    (b :: bool, _ :: unit) â† funct_DH_ZK (in1, in2, in3) ((h,a,b), r);
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf (b); 
    (((w0,z0),(w1,z1)),s') â† ğ’œ2 h0 h1 a b0 b1 M s;
    adv_out â† ğ’œ3 s';
    D (adv_out, ((z0 âŠ— (inv w0 [^] Î±0))))}"
    by(simp add: P1_real_model_def assms split_def Let_def power_swap)
  ultimately show ?thesis  
    by(simp add: P1_real_model_def ddh.DDH0_def Let_def)
qed

lemma P1_ideal_ddh1_Ïƒ_false:
  assumes "Ïƒ = False"
  shows "((P1_ideal_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = (ddh.DDH1 (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false M z ğ’œ D))"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "((P1_ideal_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    r â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let h0 = â™g [^] Î±0;
    let h1 = â™g [^] Î±1;
    let a = â™g [^] r;
    let b0 = (â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0;
    let b1 = h1 [^] r âŠ— â™g;
    ((in1, in2, in3),s) â† ğ’œ1 M h0 h1 a b0 b1 z;
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf ((in1, in2, in3) = (h,a,b));
    (((w0,z0),(w1,z1)),s') â† ğ’œ2 h0 h1 a b0 b1 M s;
    let x0 = (z0 âŠ— (inv w0 [^] Î±0));
    let x1 = (z1 âŠ— (inv w1 [^] Î±1));
    (_, f_out2) â† funct_OT_12  (x0, x1) Ïƒ;
    adv_out â† ğ’œ3 s';
    D (adv_out, f_out2)}"
    by(simp add: P1_ideal_model_def assms split_def Let_def  power_swap)
  thus ?thesis 
    by(auto simp add: P1_ideal_model_def ddh.DDH1_def funct_OT_12_def Let_def assms )
qed

lemma P1_real_ddh1_Ïƒ_true:
  assumes "Ïƒ = True"
  shows "((P1_real_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = (ddh.DDH1 (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true M z ğ’œ D))"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "(in2 = â™g [^] (r::nat) âˆ§ in3 = in1 [^] r âˆ§ in1 = â™g [^] (Î±0::nat) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (Î±1::nat)) 
          âˆ§ in2 = â™g [^] r âˆ§ in3 = (â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0 âŠ— â™g âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r âŠ— â™g))
          âŸ· (in1 = â™g [^] Î±0 âŠ— inv (â™g [^] Î±1) âˆ§ in2 = â™g [^] r 
              âˆ§ in3 = (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r âŠ— â™g âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] r) [^] Î±1 âŠ— â™g))"
    for in1 in2 in3 r Î±0 Î±1
    by (auto simp add: P1_assert_correct1 power_swap)
  moreover have "((P1_real_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    r â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let h0 = â™g [^] Î±0;
    let h1 = â™g [^] Î±1;
    let a = â™g [^] r;
    let b0 = ((â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0) âŠ— â™g;
    let b1 = (h1 [^] r) âŠ— â™g;
    ((in1, in2, in3),s) â† ğ’œ1 M h0 h1 a b0 b1 z;
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    (b :: bool, _ :: unit) â† funct_DH_ZK (in1, in2, in3) ((h,a,b), r);
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf (b); 
    (((w0,z0),(w1,z1)),s') â† ğ’œ2 h0 h1 a b0 b1 M s;
    adv_out â† ğ’œ3 s';
    D (adv_out, ((z1 âŠ— (inv w1 [^] Î±1))))}"
    by(simp add: P1_real_model_def assms split_def Let_def power_swap)
  ultimately show ?thesis  
    by(simp add: Let_def P1_real_model_def ddh.DDH1_def assms power_swap)
qed

lemma P1_ideal_ddh0_Ïƒ_true:
  assumes "Ïƒ = True"
  shows "((P1_ideal_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = (ddh.DDH0 (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true M z ğ’œ D))"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "((P1_ideal_model M Ïƒ z ğ’œ) â¤œ (Î» view. D view)) = do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    r â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    Î±1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let h0 = â™g [^] Î±0;
    let h1 = â™g [^] Î±1;
    let a = â™g [^] r;
    let b0 = (â™g [^] r) [^] Î±0;
    let b1 = h1 [^] r âŠ— â™g;
    ((in1, in2, in3),s) â† ğ’œ1 M h0 h1 a b0 b1 z;
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf ((in1, in2, in3) = (h,a,b));
    (((w0,z0),(w1,z1)),s') â† ğ’œ2 h0 h1 a b0 b1 M s;
    let x0 = (z0 âŠ— (inv w0 [^] Î±0));
    let x1 = (z1 âŠ— (inv w1 [^] Î±1));
    (_, f_out2) â† funct_OT_12  (x0, x1) Ïƒ;
    adv_out â† ğ’œ3 s';
    D (adv_out, f_out2)}"
    by(simp add: P1_ideal_model_def assms Let_def split_def power_swap)
  thus ?thesis 
    by(simp add: split_def Let_def P1_ideal_model_def ddh.DDH0_def assms funct_OT_12_def power_swap) 
qed

lemma P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_false:
  assumes "Ïƒ = False" 
  shows "mal_def.adv_P1 M Ïƒ z (P1_S1, P1_S2) ğ’œ D = ddh.DDH_advantage (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false M z ğ’œ D)"
  by(simp add: P1_adv_real_ideal_model_def ddh.DDH_advantage_def P1_ideal_ddh1_Ïƒ_false P1_real_ddh0_Ïƒ_false assms P1_advantages_eq)

lemma P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_false_bound:
  assumes "Ïƒ = False"
  shows "mal_def.adv_P1 M Ïƒ z (P1_S1, P1_S2) ğ’œ D 
          â‰¤ ddh.advantage (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false M z ğ’œ D) 
            + ddh.advantage (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false M z ğ’œ D))"
  using P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_false ddh.DDH_advantage_bound assms by metis

lemma P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_true:
  assumes "Ïƒ = True" 
  shows "mal_def.adv_P1 M Ïƒ z (P1_S1, P1_S2) ğ’œ D = ddh.DDH_advantage (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true M z ğ’œ D)"
  by(simp add: P1_adv_real_ideal_model_def ddh.DDH_advantage_def P1_real_ddh1_Ïƒ_true P1_ideal_ddh0_Ïƒ_true assms P1_advantages_eq)

lemma P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_true_bound:
  assumes "Ïƒ = True"
  shows "mal_def.adv_P1 M Ïƒ z (P1_S1, P1_S2) ğ’œ D 
          â‰¤ ddh.advantage (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true M z ğ’œ D) 
            + ddh.advantage (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true M z ğ’œ D))"
  using P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_true ddh.DDH_advantage_bound assms by metis


(*Auxillary proofs that we use in the proof of security, mainly rewriting things for P2*)

lemma P2_output_rewrite:
  assumes "s < order ğ’¢"
  shows "(â™g [^] (r * u1 + v1),  â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] u1)
           = (â™g [^] (r * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢),  
             â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
               âŠ— inv â™g [^] ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)))"
proof-
  have "â™g [^] (r * u1 + v1) = â™g [^] (r * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof-
    have "[(r * u1 + v1) = (r * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢)] (mod (order ğ’¢))"
    proof-
      have "[(r * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢) = r * (s + u1) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1)] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
        by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) cong_def mod_add_left_eq mod_add_right_eq mod_mult_right_eq)
      hence "[(r * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢) = r * s + r * u1 + r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) Nat.add_diff_assoc add.assoc assms distrib_left less_or_eq_imp_le mult_le_mono)
      hence "[(r * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢) = r * u1 + r * order ğ’¢ + v1] (mod (order ğ’¢))" by simp
      thus ?thesis
        by (simp add: cong_def semiring_normalization_rules(23))
    qed 
    then show ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  qed
  moreover have " â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
               âŠ— inv â™g [^] ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)) 
                    = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] u1" 
  proof-
    have "â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±)"
    proof-
      have "[(r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) = r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±] (mod (order ğ’¢))"
      proof-
        have "[(r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * (s + u1) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) * Î±] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
          using cong_def mod_add_cong mod_mult_left_eq mod_mult_right_eq by blast
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * s + r * Î± * u1 + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) * Î±] (mod (order ğ’¢))"
          by (simp add: distrib_left)
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * s + r * Î± * u1 + r * order ğ’¢ * Î± - r * s * Î± + v1 * Î±] (mod (order ğ’¢))" using distrib_right assms 
          by (smt Groups.mult_ac(3) order_gt_0 Nat.add_diff_assoc2 add.commute diff_mult_distrib2 mult.commute mult_strict_mono order.strict_implies_order semiring_normalization_rules(25) zero_order(1))
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + v1) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * u1 + r * order ğ’¢ * Î± + v1 * Î±] (mod (order ğ’¢))" by simp
        thus ?thesis
          by (simp add: cong_def semiring_normalization_rules(16) semiring_normalization_rules(23))
      qed
      thus ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
    qed
    also have "inv â™g [^] ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = inv â™g [^] u1"
    proof-
      have "[((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = u1] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
      proof-
        have "[((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = s + u1 + (order ğ’¢ - s)] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
          by (simp add: add.commute mod_add_right_eq cong_def)
        hence "[((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = u1 + order ğ’¢] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
          using assms by simp
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: cong_def)
      qed
      hence "â™g [^] ((s + u1) mod order ğ’¢ + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = â™g [^] u1"
        using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
      thus ?thesis 
        by (metis generator_closed inverse_pow_pow)
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by argo
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma P2_inv_g_rewrite:
  assumes "s < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "(inv â™g) [^] (u1' + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = â™g [^] s âŠ— inv (â™g [^] u1')"
proof-
  have power_commute_rewrite: "â™g [^] (((order ğ’¢ - s) + u1') mod order ğ’¢) =  â™g [^] (u1' + (order ğ’¢ - s))" 
    using add.commute pow_generator_mod by metis
  have "(order ğ’¢ - s + u1') mod order ğ’¢ = (int (order ğ’¢) - int s + int u1') mod order ğ’¢" 
    by (metis of_nat_add of_nat_diff order.strict_implies_order zmod_int assms(1))
  also have "... = (- int s + int u1') mod order ğ’¢" 
    by (metis (full_types) add.commute minus_mod_self1 mod_add_right_eq)
  ultimately have "(order ğ’¢ - s + u1') mod order ğ’¢ = (- int s mod (order ğ’¢) + int u1' mod (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢" 
    by presburger
  hence "â™g [^] (((order ğ’¢ - s) + u1') mod order ğ’¢)
              = â™g [^] ((- int s mod (order ğ’¢) + int u1' mod (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢)" 
    by (metis int_pow_int)
  hence "â™g [^] (u1' + (order ğ’¢ - s))
              = â™g [^] ((- int s mod (order ğ’¢) + int u1' mod (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢)" 
    using power_commute_rewrite by argo
  also have "...
              = â™g [^] (- int s mod (order ğ’¢) + int u1' mod (order ğ’¢))" 
    using pow_generator_mod_int by blast
  also have "... = â™g [^] (- int s mod (order ğ’¢)) âŠ— â™g [^] (int u1' mod (order ğ’¢))" 
    by (simp add: int_pow_mult)
  also have "... = â™g [^] (- int s) âŠ— â™g [^] (int u1')" 
    using pow_generator_mod_int by simp
  ultimately have "inv (â™g [^] (u1' + (order ğ’¢ - s))) = inv (â™g [^] (- int s) âŠ— â™g [^] (int u1'))" by simp
  hence "inv (â™g [^] ((u1' + (order ğ’¢ - s)) mod (order ğ’¢)) ) = inv (â™g [^] (- int s)) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (int u1'))"
    using pow_generator_mod 
    by (simp add: inverse_split)
  also have "... = â™g [^] (int s) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (int u1'))" 
    by (simp add: int_pow_neg)
  also have "... = â™g [^] s âŠ— inv (â™g [^] u1')" 
    by (simp add: int_pow_int)
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by (simp add: inverse_pow_pow pow_generator_mod )
qed

lemma P2_inv_g_s_rewrite:
  assumes "s < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "â™g [^] ((r::nat) * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] (u1 + (order ğ’¢ - s)) = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] s âŠ— inv â™g [^] u1"
proof-
  have in_carrier1: "inv â™g [^] (u1 + (order ğ’¢ - s)) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by blast
  have in_carrier2: "inv â™g [^] u1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
  have in_carrier_3: "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
  have "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— (inv â™g [^] (u1 + (order ğ’¢ - s))) =  â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— (â™g [^] s âŠ— inv â™g [^] u1)"
    using P2_inv_g_rewrite assms  
    by (simp add: inverse_pow_pow)
  thus ?thesis using cyclic_group_assoc in_carrier1 in_carrier2 by auto
qed

lemma P2_e0_rewrite: 
  assumes "s < order ğ’¢ "
  shows "(â™g [^] (r * x + xa), â™g [^] (r * Î± * x + xa * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] x)  = 
            (â™g [^] (r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢),
               â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  âŠ— â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s))"
proof-
  have "â™g [^] (r * x + xa) = â™g [^] (r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof-
    have "[(r * x + xa) = (r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢)] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    proof-
      have "[(r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢) 
              = (r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x)) + (r * s + xa))] (mod order ğ’¢)"  
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) mod_mod_trivial cong_add cong_def mod_mult_right_eq)
      hence "[(r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢) 
              = r * (order ğ’¢ - s) + r * x + r * s + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
        by (simp add: add.assoc distrib_left)
      hence "[(r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢) 
              = r * x + r * s + r * (order ğ’¢ - s) + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
        by (metis add.assoc add.commute)
      hence "[(r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢) 
              = r * x + r * s + r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
      proof -
        have "[(xa + r * s) mod order ğ’¢ + r * ((x + (order ğ’¢ - s)) mod order ğ’¢) = xa + r * (s + x + (order ğ’¢ - s))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          by (metis (no_types) â€¹[r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ = r * x + r * s + r * (order ğ’¢ - s) + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)â€º add.commute distrib_left)
        then show ?thesis
          by (simp add: assms add.commute distrib_left order.strict_implies_order)
      qed
      hence "[(r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢) 
              = r * x + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
      proof -
        have "[(xa + r * s) mod order ğ’¢ + r * ((x + (order ğ’¢ - s)) mod order ğ’¢) = xa + (r * x + r * order ğ’¢)] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          by (metis (no_types) â€¹[r * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ = r * x + r * s + r * order ğ’¢ - r * s + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)â€º add.commute add.left_commute add_diff_cancel_left')
        then show ?thesis
          by (metis (no_types) add.commute cong_add_lcancel_nat cong_def distrib_left mod_add_self2 mod_mult_right_eq)
      qed
      then show ?thesis using cong_def by metis
    qed
    then show ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  qed
  moreover have "â™g [^] (r * Î± * x + xa * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] x = 
              â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  âŠ— â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s)"
  proof-
    have "â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                = â™g [^] (r * Î± * x + xa * Î±)" 
    proof-
      have "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) = r * Î± * x + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      proof-
        have "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s) + x) + (r * s + xa) * Î±)] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          by (metis (no_types, lifting) cong_add cong_def mod_mult_left_eq mod_mult_right_eq) 
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) + r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
          by (simp add: add.assoc distrib_left distrib_right)
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
          by (simp add: add.commute add.left_commute)
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * order ğ’¢ - r * Î± * s + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
        proof -
          have "âˆ€n na. Â¬ (n::nat) â‰¤ na âˆ¨ n + (na - n) = na"
            by (meson ordered_cancel_comm_monoid_diff_class.add_diff_inverse)
          then have "r * Î± * s + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) = r * Î± * order ğ’¢"
            by (metis add_mult_distrib2 assms less_or_eq_imp_le)
          then have "r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * order ğ’¢ = r * Î± * s + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) + (r * Î± * x + r * s * Î±)"
            by presburger
          then have f1: "r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * order ğ’¢ - r * Î± * s = r * Î± * s + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) - r * Î± * s + (r * Î± * x + r * s * Î±)"
            by simp
          have "r * Î± * s + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) = r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) + r * Î± * s"
            by presburger
          then have "r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * order ğ’¢ - r * Î± * s = r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s)"
            using f1 diff_add_inverse2 by presburger
          then show ?thesis
            using â€¹[r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î± = r * Î± * x + r * s * Î± + r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ - s) + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)â€º by presburger
        qed
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * x + r * Î± * s + r * Î± * order ğ’¢ - r * Î± * s + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
          using add.commute add.assoc by force
        hence "[(r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) 
                  = r * Î± * x + r * Î± * order ğ’¢ + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)" by simp
        thus ?thesis using cong_def semiring_normalization_rules(23) 
          by (simp add: â€¹â‹€c b a. [b = c] (mod a) = (b mod a = c mod a)â€º â€¹â‹€c b a. a + b + c = a + c + bâ€º)
      qed
      thus ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
    qed
    also have "â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s) = â™g [^] x"
    proof-
      have "[((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s) = x] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
      proof-
        have "[((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s) = (order ğ’¢ - s + x+ s)] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
          by (simp add: add.commute cong_def mod_add_right_eq)
        hence "[((order ğ’¢ - s + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s) = (order ğ’¢ + x)] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
          using assms by auto
        thus ?thesis
          by (simp add: cong_def)
      qed
      thus ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by argo
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma P2_case_l_new_1_gt_e0_rewrite:
  assumes "s < order ğ’¢"
  shows "(â™g [^] (r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
            + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢),
              â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) âŠ—
                  â™g [^] (t * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢ 
                    + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))) = (â™g [^] (r * x + xa), â™g [^] (r * Î± * x + xa * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] (t * x))"
proof-
  have "â™g [^] ((r::nat) * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢)
                   + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢)
                                = â™g [^] (r * x + xa)"
  proof(cases "r = 0")
    case True
    then show ?thesis 
      by (simp add: pow_generator_mod)
  next
    case False
    have "[(r::nat) * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢)
                  + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ = r * x + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    proof-
      have "[r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                  + (r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) + xa) mod order ğ’¢
                        =  (r * (((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x)) 
                              + (r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) + xa))] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
      proof -
        have "order ğ’¢ â‰  0"
          using order_gt_0 by simp
        then show ?thesis
          using  cong_add cong_def mod_mult_right_eq 
          by (smt mod_mod_trivial)
      qed
      hence "[r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                  + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢
                        =  r * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))) + r * x 
                              + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa)] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
      proof -
        have "[r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                = r * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))) + r * x] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          by (simp add: cong_def distrib_left mod_mult_right_eq)
        then show ?thesis
          using assms cong_add gr_implies_not0 by fastforce
      qed
      hence "[r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                    + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢
                          =  r * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + r * x 
                                + r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
        by (simp add: ab_semigroup_mult_class.mult_ac(1) right_diff_distrib' add.assoc)
      hence "[r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                    + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢
                          =  r * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ + r * x + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
      proof-
        have "r * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) > 0" 
        proof-
          have "order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ > s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))" 
          proof- 
            have "(nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) â‰¤ order ğ’¢" 
            proof -
              have "âˆ€x0 x1. ((x0::int) mod x1 < x1) = (Â¬ x1 + - 1 * (x0 mod x1) â‰¤ 0)"
                by linarith
              then have "Â¬ int (order ğ’¢) + - 1 * (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) â‰¤ 0"
                using of_nat_0_less_iff order_gt_0 by fastforce
              then show ?thesis
                by linarith
            qed
            thus ?thesis using assms 
            proof -
              have "âˆ€n na. Â¬ n â‰¤ na âˆ¨ Â¬ na * order ğ’¢ < n * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
                by (meson â€¹nat (fst (bezw (t::nat) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) â‰¤ order ğ’¢â€º mult_le_mono not_le)
              then show ?thesis
                by(metis  (no_types, hide_lams) â€¹(s::nat) < order ğ’¢â€º mult_less_cancel2 nat_less_le not_le not_less_zero)
            qed
          qed
          thus ?thesis using False
            by auto
        qed
        thus ?thesis 
        proof -
          have "r * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ + r * x + xa = r * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))) + (r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + xa) + r * x"
            using â€¹(0::nat) < (r::nat) * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - r * (s::nat) * nat (fst (bezw (t::nat) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))â€º diff_mult_distrib2 by force
          then show ?thesis
            by (metis (no_types) â€¹[(r::nat) * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - (s::nat) * nat (fst (bezw (t::nat) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + (x::nat)) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + (xa::nat)) mod order ğ’¢ = r * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))) + r * x + (r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + xa)] (mod order ğ’¢)â€º semiring_normalization_rules(23))
        qed
      qed
      hence "[r * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                    + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢
                          = r * x + xa] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) mod_mult_self4 add.assoc mult.commute cong_def)
      thus ?thesis by blast
    qed
    then show ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  qed
  moreover have "â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) 
                      + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±) âŠ—
                             â™g [^] (t * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢ 
                                  + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))
                                      =  â™g [^] (r * Î± * x + xa * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] (t * x)"
  proof-
    have "â™g [^] (r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±)
              = â™g [^] (r * Î± * x + xa * Î±)"
    proof-
      have "[r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±
                  = r * Î± * x + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      proof-
        have "[r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±
                  = r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))) + x) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)"
        proof -
          show ?thesis
            by (meson cong_def mod_add_cong mod_mult_left_eq mod_mult_right_eq)
        qed 
        hence mod_eq: "[r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±
                  = r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))) + r * Î± * x + r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) * Î± + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          by (simp add: distrib_left distrib_right add.assoc)
        hence mod_eq': "[r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±
                  = r * Î± * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - r * Î± * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + r * Î± * x + r * Î± * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          by (simp add: semiring_normalization_rules(16) diff_mult_distrib2 semiring_normalization_rules(18))
        hence "[r * Î± * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢) + (r * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + xa) mod order ğ’¢ * Î±
                  = r * Î± * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ + r * Î± * x + xa * Î±] (mod order ğ’¢)"
        proof(cases "r * Î± = 0")
          case True
          then show ?thesis 
            by (metis mod_eq' diff_zero mult_0 plus_nat.add_0)
        next
          case False
          hence bound: " r * Î± * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - r * Î± * s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) > 0" 
          proof-
            have "s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) < order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢" 
              using assms 
              by (simp add: mult_strict_mono nat_less_iff)
            thus ?thesis 
              using False by auto
          qed
          thus ?thesis 
          proof -
            have "r * Î± * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ = r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))) 
                                                      + r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) * Î±"
              using bound diff_mult_distrib2 by force
            then have "r * Î± * order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ + r * Î± * x = r * Î± * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))) 
                                                                  + r * Î± * x + r * s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) * Î±"
              by presburger
            then show ?thesis
              using mod_eq by presburger
          qed
        qed
        thus ?thesis 
          by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) add.assoc cong_def mod_mult_self3)
      qed
      then show ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
    qed
    also have "â™g [^] (t * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))
                    = â™g [^] (t * x)"
    proof-
      have "[t * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))) = t * x] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      proof-
        have "[t * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))
                    = (t * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
          using cong_def mod_add_left_eq mod_mult_cong by blast
        hence "[t * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) + x) mod order ğ’¢ + s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))
                    = t * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ + x )] (mod order ğ’¢)"
        proof-
          have "order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) > 0" 
          proof-
            have "(nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) â‰¤ order ğ’¢" 
              using nat_le_iff order.strict_implies_order order_gt_0
              by (simp add: order.strict_implies_order)
            thus ?thesis 
              by (metis assms diff_mult_distrib le0 linorder_neqE_nat mult_strict_mono not_le zero_less_diff)
          qed
          thus ?thesis 
            using â€¹[(t::nat) * ((order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - (s::nat) * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + (x::nat)) mod order ğ’¢ + s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))) = t * (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + x + s * nat (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)â€º by auto
        qed
        thus ?thesis 
          by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) add.commute cong_def mod_mult_right_eq mod_mult_self1)
      qed
      thus ?thesis using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong  by blast
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by argo
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma P2_case_l_neq_1_gt_x0_rewrite:
  assumes "t < order ğ’¢" 
    and "t â‰  0"
  shows "â™g [^] (t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))) = â™g [^] (t * u0) âŠ—  â™g [^] s"
proof-
  from assms have gcd: "gcd t (order ğ’¢) = 1" 
    using prime_field coprime_imp_gcd_eq_1 by blast
  hence inverse_t: "[ s * (t * (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)))) = s * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
    by (metis Num.of_nat_simps(2) Num.of_nat_simps(5) cong_scalar_left order_gt_0 inverse) 
  hence inverse_t': "[t * u0 + s * (t * (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)))) =t * u0 + s * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_add_lcancel by fastforce
  have eq: "int (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) = (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢" 
  proof-
    have "(fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢ â‰¥ 0" using order_gt_0 by simp
    hence "(nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)) = (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢" by linarith
    thus ?thesis by blast 
  qed
  have "[(t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))) = t * u0 + s] (mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof-
    have "[t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))) = t * u0 + t * (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      by (simp add: distrib_left)
    hence "[t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))) = t * u0 + s * (t * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      by (simp add: ab_semigroup_mult_class.mult_ac(1) mult.left_commute)
    hence "[t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))) = t * u0 + s * (t * ( ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      using eq 
      by (simp add: distrib_left mult.commute semiring_normalization_rules(18))
    hence "[t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))) = t * u0 + s * (t * (fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) cong_def mod_add_right_eq mod_mult_right_eq)
    hence "[t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢)))) = t * u0 + s * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)" using inverse_t'  
      using cong_trans cong_int_iff by blast
    thus ?thesis by simp
  qed
  hence "â™g [^] (t * (u0 + (s * (nat ((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢))) mod order ğ’¢))))) = â™g [^] (t * u0 + s)" using finite_group pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  thus ?thesis 
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult)
qed

text â€¹ Now we show the two end definitions are equal when the input for l (in the ideal model, the second input) is the one constructed by the simulator â€º

lemma P2_ideal_real_end_eq:
  assumes b0_inv_b1: "b0 âŠ— inv b1 = (h0 âŠ— inv h1) [^] r"
    and assert_in_carrier: "h0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ h1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and x1_in_carrier: "x1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and x0_in_carrier: "x0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
  shows "P2_ideal_model_end (x0,x1) (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) ((h0,h1, â™g [^] (r::nat),b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3 = P2_real_model_end (x0,x1) ((h0,h1, â™g [^] (r::nat),b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3"
  including monad_normalisation
proof(cases "(b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) = ğŸ­") â€• â€¹ The case distinctions follow the 3 cases give on p 193/194*) â€º
  case True
  have b1_h1: "b1 = h1 [^] r" 
  proof-
    from b0_inv_b1 assert_in_carrier have "b0 âŠ— inv b1 = h0 [^] r âŠ— inv h1 [^] r" 
      by (simp add: pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI)
    hence "b0 âŠ— inv h0 [^] r = b1 âŠ— inv h1 [^] r"
      by (metis Units_eq Units_l_cancel local.inv_equality True assert_in_carrier 
              cyclic_group.inverse_pow_pow cyclic_group_axioms 
                  inv_closed nat_pow_closed r_inv)
    with True have "ğŸ­ = b1 âŠ— inv h1 [^] r" 
      by (simp add: assert_in_carrier inverse_pow_pow)
    hence "ğŸ­ âŠ— h1 [^] r = b1" 
      by (metis assert_in_carrier cyclic_group.inverse_pow_pow cyclic_group_axioms inv_closed inv_inv l_one local.inv_equality nat_pow_closed) 
    thus ?thesis 
      using assert_in_carrier l_one by blast
  qed
  obtain Î± :: nat where Î±: "â™g [^] Î± = h1" and "Î± < order ğ’¢"
    by (metis mod_less_divisor assert_in_carrier generatorE order_gt_0 pow_generator_mod) 
  obtain s :: nat where s: "â™g [^] s = x1" and s_lt: "s < order ğ’¢"  
    by (metis assms(3) mod_less_divisor generatorE order_gt_0 pow_generator_mod)
  have "b1 âŠ— inv â™g = â™g [^] (r * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g" 
    by (metis Î± b1_h1 generator_closed mult.commute nat_pow_pow)
  have a_g_exp_rewrite: "(â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0 =  â™g [^] (r * u0 + v0)" 
    for u0 v0 
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow)
  have z1_rewrite: "(b1 âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— h1 [^] v1 âŠ— ğŸ­ = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 +  v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] u1" 
    for u1 v1 :: nat 
    by (smt Î± b1_h1 pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute generator_closed inv_closed m_assoc m_closed monoid_comm_monoidI mult.commute nat_pow_closed nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow r_one) 
  have z1_rewrite': "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] s âŠ—  inv â™g [^] u1 = (b1 âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— h1 [^] v1 âŠ— x1"
    for u1 v1 
    using assert_in_carrier cyclic_group_commute m_assoc s z1_rewrite by auto
  have "P2_ideal_model_end (x0,x1) (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) ((h0,h1, â™g [^] (r::nat),b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3 = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;
    let w1 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u1 âŠ— â™g [^] v1;
    let z0 = b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0;
    let z1 = (b1 âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— h1 [^] v1 âŠ— ğŸ­;
    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}"
    by(simp add: P2_ideal_model_end_def True funct_OT_12_def)
  also have "... = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;
    let w1 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u1 âŠ— â™g [^] v1;
    let z0 = b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0;
    let z1 = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] u1;
    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}"
    by(simp add: z1_rewrite)
  also have "... = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;
    let w1 = â™g [^] (r * u1 + v1);
    let z0 = b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0;

    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}"
    by(simp add: a_g_exp_rewrite)
  also have "... = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† map_spmf (Î» u1'. (s + u1') mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    v1 â† map_spmf (Î» v1'. ((r * order ğ’¢ - r * s) + v1')  mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;
    let w1 = â™g [^] (r * u1 + v1);
    let z0 = b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0;
    let z1 = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] (u1 + (order ğ’¢ - s));
    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}"
    apply(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
    using P2_output_rewrite assms s_lt assms by presburger 
  also have "... = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;
    let w1 = â™g [^] (r * u1 + v1);
    let z0 = b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0;
    let z1 = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u1 + v1 * Î±) âŠ— inv â™g [^] (u1 + (order ğ’¢ - s));
    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}"
    by(simp add: samp_uni_plus_one_time_pad)
  also have "... = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;

    let e1 = (w1,z1);

    by(simp add: P2_inv_g_s_rewrite assms s_lt cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  also have "... = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);

    by(simp add: a_g_exp_rewrite z1_rewrite')
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by(simp add: P2_real_model_end_def)
next
  obtain Î± :: nat where Î±: "â™g [^] Î± = h0"  
    using generatorE assms  
    using assert_in_carrier by auto 
  have w0_rewrite: "â™g [^] (r * u0 + v0) =  (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0"
    for u0 v0 
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow)
  have order_gt_0: "order ğ’¢ > 0" using order_gt_0 by simp
  obtain s :: nat where s: "â™g [^] s = x0" and s_lt: "s < order ğ’¢" 
    by (metis mod_less_divisor generatorE order_gt_0 pow_generator_mod x0_in_carrier)
  case False â€• â€¹case 2â€º
  hence l_neq_1: "(b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) â‰  ğŸ­"by auto
  then show ?thesis 
  proof(cases "(b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) = â™g")
    case True
    hence "b0 = â™g âŠ— h0 [^] r" 
      by (metis assert_in_carrier generator_closed inv_solve_right nat_pow_closed) 
    hence "b0 = â™g âŠ— â™g [^] (r * Î±)" 
      by (metis Î± generator_closed mult.commute nat_pow_pow)
    have z0_rewrite: "b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— ğŸ­ = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] u0" 
      for u0 v0 :: nat 
      by (smt Î± â€¹b0 = â™g âŠ— â™g [^] (r * Î±)â€º pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute generator_closed m_assoc monoid_comm_monoidI mult.commute nat_pow_closed nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow r_one)
    have z0_rewrite': "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] (u0 + s) =  â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] s"
      for u0 v0
      by (simp add: add.assoc nat_pow_mult)
    have z0_rewrite'': "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] u0 âŠ— x0 =  b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0"
      for u0 v0 using z0_rewrite 
      using assert_in_carrier by auto
    have "P2_ideal_model_end (x0,x1) (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) ((h0,h1,â™g [^] (r::nat),b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3 = do {

      apply(simp add: P2_ideal_model_end_def True funct_OT_12_def) 
      using order_gt_0 order_gt_1_gen_not_1 True l_neq_1 by auto 
    also have "... = do {

      by(simp add: z0_rewrite w0_rewrite)
    also have "... = do {
    u0 â† map_spmf (Î» u0. ((order ğ’¢ - s) + u0) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));

    let e1 = (w1,z1);

      apply(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
      using P2_e0_rewrite assms s_lt assms by presburger 
    also have "... = do {
    u0 â† map_spmf (Î» u0. ((order ğ’¢ - s) + u0) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));

      by(simp add: z0_rewrite' s)
    also have "... = do {

      by(simp add: P2_real_model_end_def)
  next 
    case False â€• â€¹case 3â€º
    have b0_l: "b0 = (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) âŠ— h0 [^] r"
      by (simp add: assert_in_carrier m_assoc)
    have b0_g_r:"b0 = (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) âŠ— â™g [^] (r * Î±)"
      by (metis Î± b0_l generator_closed mult.commute nat_pow_pow)
    obtain t :: nat where t: "â™g [^] t = (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r)))" and t_lt_order_g: "t < order ğ’¢"
      by (metis (full_types) mod_less_divisor order_gt_0 pow_generator_mod 
                assert_in_carrier cyclic_group.generatorE cyclic_group_axioms 
                      inv_closed m_closed nat_pow_closed)
    with l_neq_1 have t_neq_0: "t â‰  0" using l_neq_1_exp_neq_0 by simp
    have z0_rewrite: "b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— ğŸ­ = â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— ((b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r)))) [^] u0"
      for u0 v0 
    proof-
      from b0_l have "b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 = ((b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) âŠ— h0 [^] r) [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0" by simp
      hence "b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 = ((b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r)))) [^] u0 âŠ— (h0 [^] r) [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0" 
        by (simp add: assert_in_carrier pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI)
      hence "b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 = ((â™g [^] Î±) [^] r) [^] u0 âŠ— (â™g [^] Î±) [^] v0 âŠ— ((b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r)))) [^] u0" 
        using cyclic_group_assoc cyclic_group_commute assert_in_carrier Î± by simp 
      hence "b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 =  â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ—  ((b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r)))) [^] u0" 
        by (simp add: monoid.nat_pow_pow mult.commute nat_pow_mult)
      thus ?thesis 
        by (simp add: assert_in_carrier)
    qed
    have z0_rewrite': "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— ((b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r)))) [^] u0 =  â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] (t * u0)"
      for u0 v0 
      by (metis generator_closed nat_pow_pow t)
    have z0_rewrite'': "â™g [^] (r * Î± * u0 + v0 * Î±) âŠ— â™g [^] (t * u0) âŠ— â™g [^] s =  b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0"
      for u0 v0 
      using assert_in_carrier s z0_rewrite z0_rewrite' by auto
    have "P2_ideal_model_end (x0,x1) (b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r))) ((h0,h1,â™g [^] (r::nat),b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3 = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);

    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);

    return_spmf ((), out)}"
      by(simp add: P2_ideal_model_end_def l_neq_1 funct_OT_12_def w0_rewrite z0_rewrite)
    also have "...  = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);

      by(simp add: z0_rewrite')
    also have "...  = do {
    u0 â† map_spmf (Î» u0. (order ğ’¢ * order ğ’¢ - (s * ((nat (((fst (bezw t (order ğ’¢)))) mod (order ğ’¢))))) + u0) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));

    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);

      by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def s_lt P2_case_l_new_1_gt_e0_rewrite cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
    also have "...  = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);

    let e1 = (w1,z1);

      by(simp add: samp_uni_plus_one_time_pad)
    also have "...  = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);

    let z1 = (b1 âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— h1 [^] v1 âŠ— x1;
    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}" 
      by(simp add: P2_case_l_neq_1_gt_x0_rewrite t_lt_order_g t_neq_0 cyclic_group_assoc)
    also have "...  = do {
    u0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v0 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    u1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    v1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w0 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0;
    let w1 = (â™g [^] (r::nat)) [^] u1 âŠ— â™g [^] v1;
    let z0 = b0 [^] u0 âŠ— h0 [^] v0 âŠ— x0;
    let z1 = (b1 âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— h1 [^] v1 âŠ— x1;
    let e0 = (w0,z0);
    let e1 = (w1,z1);
    out â† ğ’œ3 e0 e1 s';
    return_spmf ((), out)}" 
      by(simp add: w0_rewrite z0_rewrite'')
    ultimately show ?thesis 
      by(simp add: P2_real_model_end_def)
  qed
qed

lemma P2_ideal_real_eq: 
  assumes x1_in_carrier: "x1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and x0_in_carrier: "x0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"  
  shows "P2_real_model (x0,x1) Ïƒ  z ğ’œ  = P2_ideal_model (x0,x1) Ïƒ  z ğ’œ"
proof-
  have "P2_real_model' (x0, x1) Ïƒ  z ğ’œ = P2_ideal_model' (x0, x1) Ïƒ  z ğ’œ"
  proof-
    have 1:"do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    ((h0,h1,a,b0,b1),s) â† ğ’œ1 Ïƒ z;
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf (h0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ h1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢  âˆ§ a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢);
    (((in1, in2, in3), r),s') â† ğ’œ2 (h0,h1,a,b0,b1) s; 
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    (out_zk_funct, _) â† funct_DH_ZK (h,a,b) ((in1, in2, in3), r);  
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf out_zk_funct;
    let l = b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r));
    P2_ideal_model_end (x0,x1) l ((h0,h1,a,b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3} = P2_ideal_model' (x0,x1) Ïƒ z ğ’œ"
      unfolding P2_ideal_model'_def by simp
    have "P2_real_model' (x0, x1) Ïƒ  z ğ’œ = do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    ((h0,h1,a,b0,b1),s) â† ğ’œ1 Ïƒ z;
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf (h0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ h1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢  âˆ§ a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢);
    (((in1, in2, in3), r),s') â† ğ’œ2 (h0,h1,a,b0,b1) s; 
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    (out_zk_funct, _) â† funct_DH_ZK (h,a,b) ((in1, in2, in3), r);  
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf out_zk_funct;
    P2_real_model_end (x0, x1) ((h0,h1,a,b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3}"
      by(simp add: P2_real_model'_def)
    also have "... = do {
    let (ğ’œ1, ğ’œ2, ğ’œ3) = ğ’œ;
    ((h0,h1,a,b0,b1),s) â† ğ’œ1 Ïƒ z;
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf (h0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ h1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢  âˆ§ a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢ âˆ§ b1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢);
    (((in1, in2, in3), r),s') â† ğ’œ2 (h0,h1,a,b0,b1) s; 
    let (h,a,b) = (h0 âŠ— inv h1, a, b0 âŠ— inv b1);
    (out_zk_funct, _) â† funct_DH_ZK (h,a,b) ((in1, in2, in3), r);  
    _ :: unit â† assert_spmf out_zk_funct;
    let l = b0 âŠ— (inv (h0 [^] r));
    P2_ideal_model_end (x0,x1) l ((h0,h1,a,b0,b1),s') ğ’œ3}"
      by(simp add: P2_ideal_real_end_eq assms cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)  
    ultimately show ?thesis  by(simp add: P2_real_model'_def P2_ideal_model'_def)
  qed
  thus ?thesis by(simp add: P2_ideal_model_rewrite P2_real_model_rewrite)
qed

lemma malicious_sec_P2:   
  assumes x1_in_carrier: "x1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and x0_in_carrier: "x0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"  
  shows "mal_def.perfect_sec_P2 (x0,x1) Ïƒ z (P2_S1, P2_S2) ğ’œ"
  unfolding malicious_base.perfect_sec_P2_def
  by (simp add: P2_ideal_real_eq P2_ideal_view_unfold assms)

(*correctness*)

lemma correct:
  assumes "x0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and "x1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
  shows "funct_OT_12 (x0, x1) Ïƒ = protocol_ot (x0,x1) Ïƒ"
proof-
  have Ïƒ_eq_0_output_correct:
    "((â™g [^] Î±0) [^] r) [^] u0 âŠ— (â™g [^] Î±0) [^] v0 âŠ— x0 âŠ—
                      inv (((â™g [^] r) [^] u0 âŠ— â™g [^] v0) [^] Î±0) = x0"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
    for Î±0 r u0 v0 :: nat
  proof-
    have mult_com: "r * u0 * Î±0 = Î±0 * r * u0" by simp
    have in_carrier1: "((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0))) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0)) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
    have in_carrier2: "inv ((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0))) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0)) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
    have "?lhs = ((â™g [^] (Î±0 * r * u0))) âŠ— (â™g [^] (Î±0 * v0)) âŠ— x0 âŠ—
                        inv (((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0)))" 
      by (simp add: nat_pow_pow pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI)
    also have "... = (((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0))) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0))) âŠ— x0 âŠ—
                        (inv (((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0))))" 
      using mult.commute mult.assoc mult_com   
      by (metis (no_types) mult.commute) 
    also have "... = x0 âŠ— (((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0))) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0))) âŠ—
                        (inv (((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0))))"
      using cyclic_group_commute in_carrier1 assms by simp
    also have "... = x0 âŠ— ((((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0))) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0))) âŠ—
                        (inv (((â™g [^] (r  * u0 * Î±0)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v0 * Î±0)))))"
      using cyclic_group_assoc in_carrier1 in_carrier2 assms by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using assms by simp
  qed
  have Ïƒ_eq_1_output_correct: 
    "((â™g [^] Î±1) [^] r âŠ— â™g âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— (â™g [^] Î±1) [^] v1 âŠ— x1 âŠ—
                               inv (((â™g [^] r) [^] u1 âŠ— â™g [^] v1) [^] Î±1) = x1"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
    for Î±1 r u1 v1 :: nat
  proof-
    have com1: "Î±1 * r * u1 = r *  u1 * Î±1" "v1 * Î±1 = Î±1 * v1" by simp+
    have in_carrier1: "(â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1)) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
    have in_carrier2: "inv ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1))) âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
    have lhs: "?lhs = ((â™g [^] (Î±1*r)) âŠ— â™g âŠ— inv â™g) [^] u1 âŠ— (â™g [^] (Î±1 * v1)) âŠ— x1 âŠ—
                                 inv ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v1*Î±1))" 
      by (simp add: nat_pow_pow pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI)
    also have lhs1: "... = (â™g [^] (Î±1 * r)) [^] u1 âŠ— (â™g [^] (Î±1 * v1)) âŠ— x1 âŠ—
                                 inv ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v1*Î±1))" 
      by (simp add: cyclic_group_assoc)
    also have lhs2: "... = (â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1)) âŠ— x1 âŠ—
                                 inv ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1))" 
      by (simp add: nat_pow_pow pow_mult_distrib cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI com1)
    also have "... = (((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1))) âŠ— x1) âŠ—
                                 inv ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1))"
      using in_carrier1 in_carrier2 assms cyclic_group_assoc by blast
    also have "... = (x1 âŠ— ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— (â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1)))) âŠ—
                                 inv ((â™g [^] (r *  u1 * Î±1)) âŠ— â™g [^] (v1 * Î±1))" 
      using in_carrier1 assms cyclic_group_commute by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using cyclic_group_assoc assms in_carrier1 in_carrier1 assms cyclic_group_commute lhs1 lhs2 lhs by force
  qed
  show ?thesis
    unfolding funct_OT_12_def protocol_ot_def Let_def
    by(cases Ïƒ; auto simp add: assms Ïƒ_eq_1_output_correct Ïƒ_eq_0_output_correct bind_spmf_const
        lossless_sample_uniform_units order_gt_0 P1_assert_correct1 P1_assert_correct2 lossless_weight_spmfD) 
qed

lemma correctness:
  assumes "x0 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and "x1 âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
  shows "mal_def.correct (x0,x1) Ïƒ"
  unfolding mal_def.correct_def 
  by(simp add: correct assms)

end 

locale OT_asymp = 
  fixes ğ’¢ :: "nat â‡’ 'grp cyclic_group"
  assumes ot: "â‹€Î·. ot (ğ’¢ Î·)"
begin

sublocale ot "ğ’¢ n" for n using ot by simp

lemma correctness_asym:
  assumes "x0 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ n)" 
    and "x1 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ n)" 
  shows "mal_def.correct n (x0,x1) Ïƒ" 
  using assms correctness by simp

lemma P1_security_asym:
  "negligible (Î» n. mal_def.adv_P1 n M Ïƒ z (P1_S1 n, P1_S2) ğ’œ D)" 
  if neg1: "negligible (Î» n. ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true n M z ğ’œ D))"
    and neg2: "negligible (Î» n. ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true n M z ğ’œ D)))" 
    and neg3: "negligible (Î» n. ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D))"
    and neg4: "negligible (Î» n. ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D)))"  
proof-
  have neg_add1: "negligible (Î» n. ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true n M z ğ’œ D) 
        + ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true n M z ğ’œ D)))" 
    and neg_add2: "negligible (Î» n. ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D)
        + ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D)))"  
    using neg1 neg2 neg3 neg4 negligible_plus by(blast)+ 
  show ?thesis 
  proof(cases Ïƒ)
    case True
    have bound_mod: "Â¦mal_def.adv_P1 n M Ïƒ z (P1_S1 n, P1_S2) ğ’œ DÂ¦ 
            â‰¤ ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true n M z ğ’œ D) 
              + ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_true n M z ğ’œ D))" for n 
      by (metis (no_types) True abs_idempotent P1_adv_real_ideal_model_def P1_advantages_eq P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_true_bound)
    then show ?thesis 
      using P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_true_bound that bound_mod that negligible_le neg_add1 by presburger
  next
    case False
    have bound_mod: "Â¦mal_def.adv_P1 n M Ïƒ z (P1_S1 n, P1_S2) ğ’œ DÂ¦ 
            â‰¤ ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D) 
              + ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D))" for n 
    proof -
      have "Â¦spmf (P1_real_model n M Ïƒ z ğ’œ â¤œ D) True - spmf (P1_ideal_model n M Ïƒ z ğ’œ â¤œ D) TrueÂ¦ 
                    â‰¤ local.ddh.advantage n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D)    
                            + local.ddh.advantage n (ddh.DDH_ğ’œ' n (P1_DDH_mal_adv_Ïƒ_false n M z ğ’œ D))"
        by (metis (no_types) False P1_adv_real_ideal_model_def P1_advantages_eq P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_false_bound)
      then show ?thesis
        by (simp add: P1_adv_real_ideal_model_def P1_advantages_eq)
    qed
    then show ?thesis using P1_real_ideal_DDH_advantage_false_bound  bound_mod that negligible_le neg_add2 by presburger
  qed
qed

lemma P2_security_asym:   
  assumes x1_in_carrier: "x1 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ n)"
    and x0_in_carrier: "x0 âˆˆ carrier (ğ’¢ n)"  
  shows "mal_def.perfect_sec_P2 n (x0,x1) Ïƒ z (P2_S1 n, P2_S2 n) ğ’œ"
  using assms malicious_sec_P2 by fast

end

end
